<FONT SIZE="2" COLOR="BLACK" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="COLOR:BLACK;FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Exchange Control Information
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT COLOR="BLACK" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="COLOR:BLACK;">
	.&#160; Exchange control reporting is required to remit funds for the purchase of shares exceeding US$10,000 (including cashless exercise transactions).&#160; If reporting is required, you will be responsible for filing this report with the Central Bank of Chile.&#160; In addition, you must also file a report with the Central Bank if, in a given year, you have kept investments, deposits, or credits abroad in an amount that exceeds US$5,000,000.
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT COLOR="BLACK" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="COLOR:BLACK;">
	&#160; Registration of your investment in Company Shares with the Chilean Internal Revenue Service may result in more favorable tax treatment.&#160; Please consult your tax advisor for additional details.

<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Insider-Trading Notification
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; Grantees should be aware of the Dutch insider-trading rules, which may impact the sale of Shares acquired upon exercise of the Option.&#160; In particular, Grantees may be prohibited from effectuating certain transactions involving Shares if they have inside information about the Company.&#160; Grantees should consult their personal legal advisor if they are uncertain whether the insider-trading rules&nbsp;apply to them.&#160; By accepting the Agreement and participating in the Plan, Grantee acknowledges having read and understood this notification and acknowledges that it is his or her responsibility to comply with the Dutch insider-trading rules.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Securities Law Information
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; Grantee acknowledges that the Agreement, the grant of options, the Plan and all other materials that Grantee may receive regarding participation in the Plan do not constitute advertising or an offering of securities in Russia.&#160; The issuance of securities pursuant to the Plan has not and will not be registered in Russia and therefore, the securities described in any Plan-related documents may not be used for offering or public circulation in Russia.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Grantee further acknowledges that in no event will Shares acquired upon exercise of the options be delivered to Grantee in Russia; all Shares acquired upon exercise of the options will be maintained on Grantee&#146;s behalf in the United States.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Grantee acknowledges that Grantee is not permitted to sell Shares directly to a Russian legal entity or resident.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Grantee understands that Grantee is solely liable for all applicable Russian exchange control requirements (including repatriation requirements applicable to the proceeds from the sale of Shares).
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	No Special Employment or Similar Rights
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; Grantee understands that the Company has unilaterally, gratuitously, and discretionally decided to distribute awards under the Plan to individuals who may be employees of the Company or its subsidiaries throughout the world.&#160; The decision is a temporary decision that is entered into upon the express assumption and condition that any grant will not economically or otherwise bind the Company or any of its subsidiaries presently or in the future, other than as specifically set forth in the Plan and the terms and conditions of Grantee&#146;s option grant.&#160; Consequently, Grantee understands that any grant is given on the assumption and condition that it shall not become a part of any employment contract (either with the Company or any of its subsidiaries) and shall not be considered a mandatory benefit, salary for any purpose (including severance compensation) or any other right whatsoever.&#160; Further, Grantee understands and freely accepts that there is no guarantee that any benefit whatsoever shall arise from any gratuitous and discretionary grant since the future value of the awards and underlying shares is unknown and unpredictable.&#160; In addition, Grantee understands that this grant would not be made but for the assumptions and conditions referred to above; thus, Grantee acknowledges and freely accepts that should any or all of the assumptions be mistaken or should any of the conditions not be met for any reason, then any grant of awards shall be null and void and the Plan shall not have any effect whatsoever.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Further, the Option provides a conditional right to Shares and may be forfeited or affected by Grantee&#146;s termination of employment, as set forth in the Agreement.&#160; For avoidance of doubt, Grantee&#146;s rights, if any, to the Options upon termination of employment shall be determined as set forth in the Agreement, including, without limitation, where (i)&nbsp;Grantee is considered to be unfairly dismissed without good cause; (ii)&nbsp;Grantee is dismissed for disciplinary or objective reasons or due to a collective dismissal; (iii)&nbsp;Grantee terminates service due to a change of work location, duties or any other employment or contractual condition; or (iv)&nbsp;Grantee terminates service due to the Company&#146;s or any of its subsidiaries&#146; unilateral breach of contract.
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

	Securities Law Notice
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; The options granted under the Plan do not qualify as securities under Spanish regulations.&#160; By the grant of the options, no &#147;offer of securities to the public&#148;, as defined under Spanish law, has taken place or will take place in Spanish territory.&#160; The present document and any other document relating to the offer of options under the Plan has not been nor will it be registered with the Comisi&#243;n Nacional del Mercado de Valores (Spanish Securities Exchange Commission), and it does not constitute a public offering prospectus.
</FONT>

<BR>
<DIV>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit 10.9
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	FORM&nbsp;OF VALUE DRIVER INCENTIVE AWARD AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	This Value Driver Incentive Award Agreement (&#147;
<B>
	Agreement
</B>
	&#148;) entered into as of February&nbsp;[__], 2017 (the &#147;
<B>
	Grant Date
</B>
	&#148;), by and between Fluor Corporation, a Delaware corporation (the &#147;
<B>
	Company
</B>
	&#148;), and you (&#147;
<B>
	Grantee
</B>
	&#148; or &#147;
<B>
	you
</B>
	&#148;) evidences the grant to Grantee of a Value Driver Incentive Award (&#147;
<B>
	VDI Award
</B>
	&#148;) under the Fluor Corporation Amended&nbsp;&amp; Restated 2008 Executive Performance Incentive Plan (the &#147;
<B>
	Plan
</B>
	&#148;).&#160; Capitalized terms used in this Agreement and not defined herein have the meaning set forth in the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section&nbsp;1.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AWARD SUBJECT TO PLAN
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Your VDI Award is made subject to all of the terms and conditions of this Agreement and the Plan, including any terms, rules&nbsp;or determinations made by the Committee pursuant to its administrative authority under the Plan, and such further terms as are set forth in the Plan that are applicable to awards thereunder, including without limitation provisions on adjustment of awards, non-transferability, satisfaction of tax requirements and compliance with other laws.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section&nbsp;2.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MEASURE DEFINITIONS
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Your VDI Award performance criteria are comprised of three measures: Annual Return on Assets Employed (&#147;
<B>
	ROAE
</B>
	&#148;), Annual New Awards Gross Margin Dollars and Annual New Awards Gross Margin Percentage (the &#147;
<B>
	Performance Targets
</B>
	&#148;), averaged over a three-year performance period beginning on January&nbsp;1, 2017 and ending on December&nbsp;31, 2019 (&#147;
<B>
	Performance Period
</B>
	&#148;)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	. ROAE is calculated by dividing full year corporate net earnings (excluding after-tax interest expense) by net assets employed. Net assets employed is defined as total assets (excluding excess cash and current and non-current marketable securities) minus current liabilities (excluding non-recourse debt) and is calculated based on average net assets reported for the previous five quarters.&#160; New Awards Gross Margin Dollars measures the total amount of project gross margin that the Company expects to receive as a result of projects awarded within each year of the Performance Period.&#160; New Awards Gross Margin Percentage is the total amount of gross margin the Company expects to receive as a result of projects awarded within each year of the Performance Period as a percentage of expected revenue from those projects.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	The Performance Targets may be subject to certain adjustments approved by the Committee in connection with the grants.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section&nbsp;3.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	PERFORMANCE TARGETS AND VALUE OF AWARD
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Your VDI Award target amount is communicated in your March&nbsp;2017 LTI award letter. This target amount will be [expressed in units by dividing the target amount by the closing price of the Company&#146;s common stock ($XX.XX), par value $.01 per share (the &#147;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Shares
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	&#148;), on February&nbsp;[__], 2017 (
<I>
	e.g.,
</I>
	if your target award amount is $100,000 and the Company&#146;s Share price is $XX.XX on the applicable date, this target amount will be expressed as XXX units)].
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	2
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	[These units] will be adjusted based on the Company&#146;s performance for the Performance Period against the established Performance Targets, which will be weighted as follows: 30% ROAE, 30% New Awards Gross Margin Dollars and 40% New Awards Gross Margin Percentage. The Performance Targets relating to new awards will be measured taking into account any project scope changes or cancellations.&#160; [For 2017,] specific performance targets are set forth on Exhibit&nbsp;A, which may be attached hereto or sent to you separately at a later date. [Specific performance targets for 2018 and 2019 will be set at the beginning of the respective year and provided to you thereafter.]
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	3
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	[The units] will be further adjusted
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	based on the Company&#146;s [three-year cumulative]
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	&#160;total shareholder return relative to the engineering and construction peers included in the Company&#146;s compensation peer group on the Grant Date, as further defined and calculated as set forth on Exhibit&nbsp;B (&#147;Relative TSR&#148;).&#160; If the Company&#146;s Relative TSR is in the bottom 1/3 of the peer group, the earned awards will be decreased by 25%. If the Company&#146;s Relative TSR is in the top 1/3 of the peer group, the earned awards will be increased by 25%. No adjustment will be made if the Company&#146;s Relative TSR is in the middle 1/3 of the peer group.&#160; In no event will the earned units exceed 200% of the units granted.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="1" WIDTH="25%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:BLACK;">
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	&#160; For the Senior Management Team.&#160; The performance period for other officers will be one year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	&#160; Award to be expressed in units for the Senior Management Team.&#160; Other officers will receive a cash amount.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	&#160; For the Senior Management team.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	&#160; For the Senior Management team.&#160; The period will be one year for other officers.
</FONT>

	Section&nbsp;4.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	RETENTION PERIOD AND PAYOUT
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	The period commencing February&nbsp;[__], 2017 and ending on [
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	], 2020 will be the &#147;
<B>
	Retention Period
</B>
	&#148;. Your VDI Award will vest in full on [
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	], 2020 (the &#147;
<B>
	Vesting Date
</B>
	&#148;), subject to the continued employment requirements or other exceptions contained in Section&nbsp;5 below.&#160; Payment of the VDI Award will be made as soon as practicable after the Vesting Date, except as provided in Section&nbsp;5.&#160; The VDI Award will be paid [(i.e., settled) in Shares.&#160; Subject to the provisions of Section&nbsp;4 and Section&nbsp;5 hereof, upon the issuance to Grantee of Shares hereunder, Grantee will also receive additional Shares equal to the amount of accrued dividends or distributions paid or made by the Company on a quarterly basis, which dividends or distributions will be deemed to be reinvested throughout the Performance Period, based on the Shares awarded under this VDI Award and the performance level earned during the Performance Period; provided, that any fractional Shares will be rounded up to the nearest whole share.]
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	6
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	[Grantee may not sell or otherwise transfer the Shares issued pursuant to this VDI Award until three (3)&nbsp;years after the vesting of the underlying award (&#147;Post-Vest Holding Period&#148;).&#160; During the Post-Vest Holding Period, Grantee will be able to vote the Shares and receive any dividends issued, if any, with respect to the Shares; and the Shares must remain with the Company designated broker until the end of the Post-Vest Holding Period. Notwithstanding the foregoing, these restrictions shall immediately lapse upon Grantee&#146;s death, Disability or Qualifying Termination within two years of a Change of Control.]
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	7
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section&nbsp;5.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CONTINUED EMPLOYMENT
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Vesting of the VDI Award is conditioned upon you remaining in the employment of the Company or its subsidiaries for the Retention Period or satisfying the exceptions described in this Section&nbsp;5.&#160; If your employment with the Company or any of its subsidiaries terminates for any reason other than death, Retirement, Disability or a Qualifying Termination within two (2)&nbsp;years following a Change of Control of the Company, each as determined by the Committee in accordance with the Plan, then as of the date of such termination any unvested VDI Award shall be forfeited by you.&#160; If your employment with the Company or any of its subsidiaries terminates during the Retention Period by reason of your death or Disability, each as determined by the Committee in accordance with the Plan, then any portion of this VDI Award which has yet to become vested shall vest and continue to become payable in accordance with its terms on the Vesting Date as described in section 4
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; If prior to the VDI Award becoming vested in full pursuant to Section&nbsp;4 hereof, you Retire from the Company and you deliver a signed non-competition agreement to the Company in a form acceptable to the Company, then any portion of this VDI Award which has yet to become vested shall continue to vest over the Retention Period and become payable in accordance with the terms hereof on the Vesting Date as described in Section&nbsp;4.&#160; In the event that you incur a Qualifying Termination within two years after a Change of Control of the Company, the VDI Award will immediately vest and be paid to you at target performance levels as soon as practicable after such termination (provided that such award has not previously been forfeited pursuant to the provisions of this Agreement.)&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing and regardless of reason for termination, under all circumstances other than your Qualifying Termination within two (2)&nbsp;years following a Change of Control, any VDI Award held less than one year from the Grant Date will be forfeited[; provided, however, in the event of your Retirement, this one-year holding requirement may be waived by the Committee, in its sole and absolute discretion, and any portion of this VDI Award which has yet to become vested shall continue to vest over the Retention Period and become payable in accordance with the terms hereof on the Vesting Date as described in Section&nbsp;4]
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	9
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:37.05PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Nothing in the Plan or this Agreement confers any right of continuing employment with the Company or its subsidiaries.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, if in the event of a Change of Control the successor to the Company does not assume this Award, then any portion of this Award which has yet to become vested and which has not otherwise been forfeited pursuant to the provisions of this Section&nbsp;4 will immediately vest and will be paid at target performance levels as soon as practicable following the Change of Control (provided that the VDI Award has not previously been forfeited pursuant to the provisions of this Section&nbsp;5).&#160; Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, in the event your employment is terminated for Cause (as defined herein), regardless of whether you are retirement eligible, you will forfeit your right to receive any unvested RSUs, unless otherwise prohibited by law.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

	5

	&#160; Payment in shares for the Senior Management Team.&#160; Other officers will receive payment in cash &#147;generally on the same date that other executive incentives are paid, and in no event later than March&nbsp;15 of the year following the year in which such amount is earned&#148;.

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2230876",CP="FLUOR CORPORATION",DN="3",CHK=853500,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK106:[17ZAA3.17ZAA13503]1035-3-KM_ZAA13503.CHC",USER="JVANGB",CD='FEB 16 22:31 2017' -->
<A NAME="eolPage12"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	For purposes of this Agreement, &#147;
<B>
	Retirement
</B>
	&#148; shall mean your retirement as determined in accordance with applicable Company personnel policies and the Plan.
<B>
	&#147;Disability&#148;
</B>
	and
<B>
	&#147;Change of Control&#148;
</B>
	shall have the meanings given to them in Appendix B to this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	In connection with a Change of Control, the term &#147;
<B>
	Qualifying Termination
</B>
	&#148; means your involuntary termination of employment by the Company without Cause or your resignation for Good Reason.&#160; For this purpose, &#147;
<B>
	Cause
</B>
	&#148; means your dishonesty, fraud, willful misconduct, breach of fiduciary duty, conflict of interest, commission of a felony, material failure or refusal to perform your job duties in accordance with Company policies, a material violation of Company policy that causes harm to the Company or its subsidiaries or other wrongful conduct of a similar nature and degree; and &#147;
<B>
	Good Reason
</B>
	&#148; means a material diminution of your compensation (including, without limitation, base compensation, annual bonus opportunities, and/or equity incentive compensation opportunities), a material diminution of your authority, duties or responsibilities, a material diminution in the authority, duties or responsibilities of the supervisor to whom you are required to report or a material diminution of the budget over which you retain authority; provided, however, that no later than sixty (60) days after learning of the action (or inaction) described herein as the basis for a termination of employment for Good Reason, you must advise the Company in writing that the action (or inaction) constitutes grounds for a termination of your employment for Good Reason, in which event the Company will have thirty (30) days to correct such action (or inaction) (the &#147;
<B>
	Cure Period
</B>
	&#148;) and if such action (or inaction) is timely corrected within the Cure Period, then you will not be entitled to terminate your employment for Good Reason as a result of such action (or inaction). If such action or inaction is not timely corrected within the Cure Period, then you will be entitled to terminate your employment for Good Reason at any time within the one-hundred and twenty (120) day period following expiration of the Cure Period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section&nbsp;6.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TAX WITHHOLDING
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Regardless of any action the Company or the Grantee&#146;s employer (the &#147;
<B>
	Employer
</B>
	&#148;) takes with respect to any or all income tax, social insurance, payroll tax, payment on account or other tax-related withholding (&#147;
<B>
	Tax-Related Items
</B>
	&#148;), the Grantee acknowledges and agrees that the ultimate liability for all Tax-Related Items legally due by the Grantee is and remains the Grantee&#146;s responsibility and that the Company and/or the Employer (i)&nbsp;make no representations nor undertakings regarding the treatment of any Tax-Related Items in connection with any aspect of this grant of a VDI Award, including the grant and vesting of the VDI Award[, subsequent delivery of the Shares] and/or (ii)&nbsp;do not commit to structure the terms or any aspect of this grant of a VDI Award to reduce or eliminate the Grantee&#146;s liability for Tax-Related Items. The Grantee will pay the Company or the Employer any amount of Tax-Related Items that the Company or the Employer may be required to withhold as a result of the Grantee&#146;s participation in the Plan or the Grantee&#146;s receipt of a VDI Award that cannot be satisfied by the means described below. Further, if the Grantee is subject to tax in more than one jurisdiction, the Grantee acknowledges that the Company and/or Employer (or former Employer, as applicable) may be required to withhold or account for Tax-Related Items in more than one jurisdiction. The Company may refuse to deliver the VDI Award payment if the Grantee fails to comply with the Grantee&#146;s obligations in connection with the Tax-Related Items.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Prior to the taxable or tax withholding event, as applicable, the Grantee will pay, or make adequate arrangements satisfactory to the Company or to the Employer (in their sole discretion) to satisfy all Tax-Related Items.&#160; In this regard, the Grantee authorizes the Company or Employer to withhold all applicable Tax-Related Items legally payable by the Grantee by [(1)&nbsp;withholding from the VDI Award a number of Shares otherwise deliverable equal to the Retained Share Amount, as defined below and/or (2)] withholding from the Grantee&#146;s wages or other cash compensation paid by the Company and/or Employer.&#160; [The &#147;
<B>
	Retained Share Amount
</B>
	&#148; means a number of Shares equal to the quotient of the minimum statutory tax withholding obligation of the Company triggered by the VDI Award payment on the relevant date, divided by the fair market value of one Share on the relevant date or as otherwise provided in the Plan.&#160; If the obligation for Tax-Related Items is satisfied by withholding a number of Shares as described herein, the Grantee understands that he or she will be deemed to have been issued the full number of Shares, notwithstanding that a number of Shares are held back solely for the purpose of paying the Tax-Related Items due as a result of the settlement of the VDI Award.]
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	10
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Grantee acknowledges and understands that Grantee should consult a tax advisor regarding Grantee&#146;s tax obligations prior to such settlement or disposition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;

</DIV>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	10
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	&#160; Bracketed provisions in this section to be removed for non-Senior Management Team receiving cash awards.
</FONT>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

<A NAME="eolPage13"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section&nbsp;7.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SEVERABILITY
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	In the event that one or more of the provisions of this Agreement are invalidated for any reason by a court of competent jurisdiction, any provision so invalidated will be deemed to be separable from the other provisions hereof, and the remaining provisions hereof will continue to be valid and fully enforceable.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section&nbsp;8.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	DATA PROTECTION
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	THE GRANTEE HEREBY EXPLICITLY AND UNAMBIGUOUSLY CONSENTS TO THE COLLECTION, USE AND TRANSFER,&nbsp;IN ELECTRONIC OR OTHER FORM, OF THE GRANTEE&#146;S PERSONAL DATA AS DESCRIBED IN THIS DOCUMENT BY AND AMONG, AS APPLICABLE, THE EMPLOYER, AND THE COMPANY AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES FOR THE EXCLUSIVE PURPOSE OF IMPLEMENTING, ADMINISTERING AND MANAGING THE GRANTEE&#146;S PARTICIPATION IN THE PLAN. THE GRANTEE UNDERSTANDS THAT THE COMPANY,&nbsp;ITS SUBSIDIARIES AND THE EMPLOYER HOLD CERTAIN PERSONAL INFORMATION ABOUT THE GRANTEE,&nbsp;INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, NAME, HOME ADDRESS AND TELEPHONE NUMBER, DATE OF BIRTH, SOCIAL SECURITY OR INSURANCE NUMBER OR OTHER IDENTIFICATION NUMBER, SALARY, NATIONALITY, JOB TITLE, ANY SHARES OR DIRECTORSHIPS HELD IN THE COMPANY, DETAILS OF ALL OPTIONS OR ANY OTHER ENTITLEMENT TO SHARES AWARDED, CANCELED, PURCHASED, EXERCISED, VESTED, UNVESTED OR OUTSTANDING IN THE GRANTEE&#146;S FAVOR FOR THE PURPOSE OF IMPLEMENTING, MANAGING AND ADMINISTERING THE PLAN (&#147;DATA&#148;).&#160; THE GRANTEE UNDERSTANDS THAT THE DATA MAY&nbsp;BE TRANSFERRED TO ANY THIRD PARTIES ASSISTING IN THE IMPLEMENTATION, ADMINISTRATION AND MANAGEMENT OF THE PLAN, THAT THESE RECIPIENTS MAY&nbsp;BE LOCATED IN THE GRANTEE&#146;S COUNTRY OR ELSEWHERE,&nbsp;INCLUDING OUTSIDE THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC AREA, AND THAT THE RECIPIENT COUNTRY MAY&nbsp;HAVE DIFFERENT DATA PRIVACY LAWS AND PROTECTIONS THAN THE GRANTEE&#146;S COUNTRY. THE GRANTEE UNDERSTANDS THAT HE/SHE MAY&nbsp;REQUEST A LIST WITH THE NAMES AND ADDRESSES OF ANY POTENTIAL RECIPIENTS OF THE DATA BY CONTACTING THE LOCAL HUMAN RESOURCES REPRESENTATIVE. THE GRANTEE AUTHORIZES THE RECIPIENTS TO RECEIVE, POSSESS, USE, RETAIN AND TRANSFER THE DATA,&nbsp;IN ELECTRONIC OR OTHER FORM, FOR THE PURPOSES OF IMPLEMENTING, ADMINISTERING AND MANAGING THE GRANTEE&#146;S PARTICIPATION IN THE PLAN,&nbsp;INCLUDING ANY REQUISITE TRANSFER OF SUCH DATA, AS MAY&nbsp;BE REQUIRED TO A BROKER OR OTHER THIRD PARTY WITH WHOM THE GRANTEE MAY&nbsp;ELECT TO DEPOSIT SHARES,&nbsp;IF ANY, ACQUIRED UNDER THE PLAN. THE GRANTEE UNDERSTANDS THAT DATA WILL BE HELD ONLY AS LONG AS IS NECESSARY TO IMPLEMENT, ADMINISTER AND MANAGE PARTICIPATION IN THE PLAN. THE GRANTEE UNDERSTANDS THAT HE/SHE MAY, AT ANY TIME, VIEW DATA, REQUEST ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ABOUT THE STORAGE AND PROCESSING OF THE DATA, REQUIRE ANY NECESSARY AMENDMENTS TO THE DATA OR REFUSE OR WITHDRAW THE CONSENTS HEREIN,&nbsp;IN ANY CASE WITHOUT COST, BY CONTACTING THE LOCAL HUMAN RESOURCES REPRESENTATIVE IN WRITING. THE GRANTEE UNDERSTANDS THAT REFUSING OR WITHDRAWING CONSENT MAY&nbsp;AFFECT THE GRANTEE&#146;S ABILITY TO PARTICIPATE IN THE PLAN. FOR MORE INFORMATION ON THE CONSEQUENCES OF REFUSING TO CONSENT OR WITHDRAWING CONSENT, THE GRANTEE UNDERSTANDS THAT HE/SHE MAY&nbsp;CONTACT THE STOCK PLAN ADMINISTRATOR AT THE COMPANY.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

	Section&nbsp;9.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<B>

</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	The Grantee acknowledges and agrees that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 45.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-27.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	the Plan is established voluntarily by the Company, it is discretionary in nature and may be modified, amended, suspended or terminated by the Company at any time unless otherwise provided in the Plan or this Agreement;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 45.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-27.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	the grant of VDI Awards is voluntary and occasional and does not create any contractual or other right to receive future grants of VDI Awards, or benefits in lieu of VDI Awards, even if VDI Awards have been granted repeatedly in the past;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 45.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-27.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 45.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-27.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	the Grantee&#146;s participation in the Plan will not create a right to further employment with Employer and will not interfere with the ability of Employer to terminate the Grantee&#146;s employment relationship and it is expressly agreed and understood that employment is terminable at the will of either party, insofar as permitted by law;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 45.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-27.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(h)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	in the event that the Grantee is not an employee of the Company, this VDI Award will not be interpreted to form an employment contract or relationship with the Company, and furthermore, this VDI Award will not be interpreted to form an employment contract with the Employer or any subsidiary of the Company;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 45.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-27.0PT;">

	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	in consideration of this VDI Award, no claim or entitlement to compensation or damages will arise from termination of this grant or diminution in value of this VDI Award resulting from termination of the Grantee&#146;s employment by the Company or the Employer (for any reason whatsoever) and the Grantee irrevocably releases the Company and the Employer from any such claim that may arise; if, notwithstanding the foregoing, any such claim is found by a court of competent jurisdiction to have arisen, then, by accepting the terms of this Agreement, the Grantee will be deemed irrevocably to have waived any entitlement to pursue such claim; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 45.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-27.0PT;">

<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">

<B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EXECUTION OF AWARD AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Please acknowledge your acceptance of the terms of this Agreement by electronically signing this Agreement.&#160; If you have not electronically signed this Agreement within two (2)&nbsp;months, the Company is not obligated to provide you any benefit hereunder and may refuse to issue any payment to you under this Agreement.&#160; In addition, by signing this Agreement, you acknowledge and agree that your prior VDI awards, if any, are amended to include the 409A provisions that are part of this Agreement in Appendix B.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	This Appendix A, which is part of the Agreement, includes additional terms and conditions of the Agreement that will apply to you if you are a resident in one of the countries listed below.&#160; Capitalized terms used but not defined herein will have the same meanings assigned to them in the Plan and the Agreement.
</FONT>

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	This Appendix A also includes information regarding exchange control and certain other issues of which you should be aware with respect to your participation in the Plan.&#160; The information is based on the securities, exchange control and other laws in effect in the respective countries as of January&nbsp;2017.&#160; Such laws are often complex and change frequently.&#160; As a result, the Company strongly recommends that you not rely on the information in this Appendix A as the only source of information relating to the consequences of your participation in the Plan because such information may be out-of-date when your VDI Awards vest.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	In addition, the information contained herein is general in nature and may not apply to your particular situation.&#160; As a result, the Company is not in a position to assure you of any particular result.&#160; You are therefore advised to seek appropriate professional advice as to how the relevant laws in your country may apply to your situation.
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Securities Law Information
</FONT>
</U>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	&#160; Neither the Company, the award, nor any Company shares acquired under the Plan are registered with the Chilean Registry of Securities or are under the control of the Chilean Superintendence of Securities.
<BR>
	&#160;
<B>
<BR>
</B>
<U>
	Exchange Control Information
</U>
	.&#160; If exchange control reporting is required , you will be responsible for filing the report with the Central Bank of Chile.&#160; In addition, you must also file a report with the Central Bank if, in a given year, you have kept investments, deposits, or credits abroad in an amount that exceeds US$5,000,000.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
<BR>
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	Tax Information.
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	&#160; Registration of your investment in Company shares with the Chilean Internal Revenue Service may result in more favorable tax treatment.&#160; Please consult your tax advisor for additional details.
</FONT>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Exchange Control Information
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; To participate in the Plan, Grantee understands that Grantee must comply with exchange control regulations and rulings (the &#147;Exchange Control Regulations&#148;) in South Africa.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	For VDI Awards, because no transfer of funds from South Africa is required, no filing or reporting requirements should apply when the VDI Awards, if any, are granted or upon settlement of the VDI Awards (in Shares).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Because the Exchange Control Regulations change frequently and without notice, Grantee understands that Grantee should consult a legal advisor to ensure compliance with current regulations.&#160; Grantee understands that it is Grantee&#146;s responsibility to comply with South African exchange control laws, and neither the Company nor Grantee&#146;s Employer will be liable for any fines or penalties resulting from failure to comply with applicable laws.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	No Special Employment or Similar Rights
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; Grantee understands that the Company has unilaterally, gratuitously, and discretionally decided to distribute VDI Awards under the Plan to individuals who may be employees of the Company or its subsidiaries throughout the world.&#160; The decision is a temporary decision that is entered into upon the express assumption and condition that any grant will not economically or otherwise bind the Company or any of its subsidiaries presently or in the future, other than as specifically set forth in the Plan and the terms and conditions of Grantee&#146;s VDI Award.&#160; Consequently, Grantee understands that any grant is given on the assumption and condition that it will not become a part of any employment contract (either with the Company or any of its subsidiaries) and will not be considered a mandatory benefit, salary for any purpose (including severance compensation) or any other right whatsoever.&#160; Further, Grantee understands and freely accepts that there is no guarantee that any benefit whatsoever will arise from any gratuitous and discretionary grant.&#160; In addition, Grantee understands that this grant would not be made but for the assumptions and conditions referred to above; thus, Grantee acknowledges and freely accepts that should any or all of the assumptions be mistaken or should any of the conditions not be met for any reason, then any grant of awards will be null and void and the Plan will not have any effect whatsoever.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Further, the VDI Award provides a conditional right to Shares and may be forfeited or affected by Grantee&#146;s termination of employment, as set forth in the Agreement.&#160; For avoidance of doubt, Grantee&#146;s rights, if any, to the VDI Awards upon termination of employment will be determined as set forth in the Agreement, including, without limitation, where (i)&nbsp;Grantee is considered to be unfairly dismissed without good cause; (ii)&nbsp;Grantee is dismissed for disciplinary or objective reasons or due to a collective dismissal; (iii)&nbsp;Grantee terminates service due to a change location, duties or any other employment or contractual condition; or (iv)&nbsp;Grantee terminates service due to the Company&#146;s or any of its subsidiaries&#146; unilateral breach of contract.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Securities Law Notice
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; The VDI Awards granted under the Plan do not qualify as securities under Spanish regulations.&#160; By the grant of VDI Awards, no &#147;offer of securities to the public&#148;, as defined under Spanish law, has taken place or will take place in Spanish territory.&#160; The present document and any other document relating to the offer of VDI Awards under the Plan has not been nor will it be registered with the Comisi&#243;n Nacional del Mercado de Valores (Spanish Securities Exchange Commission), and it does not constitute a public offering prospectus.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;

</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; Grantee is responsible for complying with all reporting requirements applicable to the awards and the underlying Shares, if any.

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	There are no country-specific notifications.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	11
</FONT>
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-10_9_HTM_1035-3-KM_PB_11_043153_7091">
</A>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=11,EFW="2230876",CP="FLUOR CORPORATION",DN="3",CHK=989474,FOLIO='11',FILE="DISK106:[17ZAA3.17ZAA13503]1035-3-KM_ZAA13503.CHC",USER="JVANGB",CD='FEB 16 22:31 2017' -->
<A NAME="eolPage21"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	APPENDIX B
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Compliance with Section&nbsp;409A of the Internal Revenue Code
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	It is intended that the provisions of this Agreement comply with Section&nbsp;409A of the U.S. Internal Revenue Code (&#147;Section&nbsp;409A&#148;), and all provisions of this Agreement will be construed and interpreted in a manner consistent with the requirements for avoiding taxes or penalties under Section&nbsp;409A.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	Neither Grantee nor any of Grantee&#146;s creditors or beneficiaries will have the right to subject any deferred compensation (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;409A) payable under this Agreement to any anticipation, alienation, sale, transfer, assignment, pledge, encumbrance, attachment or garnishment.&#160; Except as permitted under Section&nbsp;409A, any deferred compensation (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;409A) payable to Grantee or for Grantee&#146;s benefit under this Agreement may not be reduced by, or offset against, any amount owing by Grantee to the Company or any of its subsidiaries.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	If, at the time of Grantee&#146;s separation from service (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;409A), (i)&nbsp;Grantee is a specified employee (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;409A and using the identification methodology selected by the Company from time to time) and (ii)&nbsp;the Company will make a good faith determination that an amount payable hereunder constitutes deferred compensation (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;409A) the payment of which is required to be delayed pursuant to the six-month delay rule&nbsp;set forth in Section&nbsp;409A in order to avoid taxes or penalties under Section&nbsp;409A, then the Company will not pay such amount on the otherwise scheduled payment date pursuant to Section&nbsp;4 of this Agreement but will instead pay it, without interest, on the first business day after such six-month period or, if earlier, upon the Grantee&#146;s death.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein, for the purpose of this Agreement, (i)&nbsp;if the VDI Award has not previously been forfeited, the VDI Award will vest on a Disability, which means that the Grantee is considered disabled in accordance with U.S. Treasury Regulations section 1.409A-3(i)(4), determined as if all permissible provisions of such regulation were in effect, and (ii)&nbsp;a Change of Control of the Company is considered to have occurred with respect to the Grantee upon the occurrence with respect to the Grantee of a change in the ownership or effective control of the Company or a change in the ownership of a substantial portion of the assets of the Company, as determined in accordance with U.S. Treasury Regulations section 1.409A-3(i)(5).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	Notwithstanding any provision of this Agreement to the contrary, in light of the uncertainty with respect to the proper application of Section&nbsp;409A, the Company reserves the right to make amendments to this Agreement as the Company deems necessary or desirable to avoid the imposition of taxes or penalties under Section&nbsp;409A.&#160; In any case, Grantee will be solely responsible and liable for the satisfaction of all taxes and penalties that may be imposed on Grantee or for Grantee&#146;s account in connection with this Agreement (including, without limitation, any taxes and penalties under Section&nbsp;409A), and neither the Company nor any of its subsidiaries will have any obligation to indemnify or otherwise hold Grantee harmless from any or all of such taxes or penalties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	12
</FONT>
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-10_9_HTM_1035-3-KM_PB_12_043203_455">
</A>
</P>

<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit 10.14
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	FORM&nbsp;OF RESTRICTED STOCK UNIT AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:37.05PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	This Restricted Stock Unit Agreement (&#147;
<B>
	Agreement
</B>
	&#148;) entered into as of February&nbsp;[__], 2017 (the &#147;
<B>
	Grant Date
</B>
	&#148;), by and between Fluor Corporation, a Delaware corporation (the &#147;
<B>
	Company
</B>
	&#148;), and you (&#147;
<B>
	Grantee
</B>
	&#148; or &#147;
<B>
	you
</B>
	&#148;) evidences the grant to Grantee of a Stock Unit Award (&#147;
<B>
	RSU Award
</B>
	&#148;) under the Fluor Corporation Amended&nbsp;&amp; Restated 2008 Executive Performance Incentive Plan (the &#147;
<B>
	Plan
</B>
	&#148;).&#160; Capitalized terms used in this Agreement and not defined herein have the meaning set forth in the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section&nbsp;1.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AWARD SUBJECT TO PLAN
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:37.05PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	This RSU Award is made subject to all of the terms and conditions of this Agreement and the Plan, including any terms, rules&nbsp;or determinations made by the Committee pursuant to its administrative authority under the Plan, and such further terms as are set forth in the Plan that are applicable to awards thereunder, including without limitation provisions on adjustment of awards, non-transferability, satisfaction of tax requirements and compliance with other laws.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section&nbsp;2.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	RESTRICTED STOCK UNIT AWARD
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:37.05PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	The Company hereby awards Grantee restricted stock units (&#147;
<B>
	RSUs
</B>
	&#148;), subject to the terms and conditions set forth herein.&#160; Each RSU represents the right to receive one share of Company common stock, par value $.01 per share (&#147;
<B>
	Shares
</B>
	&#148;), pursuant to this RSU Award, subject to the terms and conditions set forth herein.&#160; Subject to the provisions of Section&nbsp;3 and Section&nbsp;4 hereof, upon the issuance to Grantee of Shares hereunder, Grantee shall also receive cash in an amount equivalent to any dividends or distributions paid or made by the Company from the date of this RSU Award to the date of the issuance of the Shares with respect to an equivalent number of Shares so issued.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section&nbsp;3.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	RESTRICTIONS ON SALE OR OTHER TRANSFER
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:37.05PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Each RSU awarded to Grantee pursuant to this Agreement shall be subject to forfeiture to the Company and each RSU may not be sold or otherwise transferred except pursuant to the following provisions:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	The RSUs shall be held in book entry form by the Company until (1)&nbsp;the restrictions set forth herein lapse in accordance with the provisions of Section&nbsp;4, at which time the RSUs will be converted to Shares, or (2)&nbsp;the RSUs are forfeited pursuant to Section&nbsp;4 hereof.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	No such RSUs may be sold, transferred or otherwise alienated or hypothecated so long as such RSUs are subject to the restrictions provided for in this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	[Grantee may not sell or otherwise transfer the Shares issued pursuant to this RSU Award until three (3)&nbsp;years after the vesting of the underlying RSUs (&#147;Post-Vest Holding Period&#148;).&#160; During the Post-Vest Holding Period, Grantee will be able to vote the Shares and receive any dividends issued, if any, with respect to the Shares; and the Shares must remain with the Company designated broker until the end of the Post-Vest Holding Period. Notwithstanding the foregoing, these restrictions shall immediately lapse upon Grantee&#146;s death, Disability or Qualifying Termination within two years of a Change of Control].
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	1
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	The Company may impose such other restrictions, conditions or limitations as it determines appropriate as to the timing and manner of any re-sales by the Grantee or other subsequent transfers by the Grantee of any Shares of common stock issued as a result of the vesting of the RSUs, including without limitation (i)&nbsp;restrictions under an insider trading policy, (ii)&nbsp;restrictions designed to delay and/or coordinate the timing and manner of sales by Grantee and other Share holders and (iii)&nbsp;restrictions as to the use of a specified brokerage firm for such re-sales or other transfers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section&nbsp;4.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LAPSE OF RESTRICTIONS
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	2
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	The RSUs subject to this RSU Award shall vest and restrictions thereon shall lapse at a rate of one third of such number per year on [VESTING DATE] of each year, commencing with [VESTING DATE], 2018 and annually thereafter ending with [VESTING DATE], 2020
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	, provided that Grantee&#146;s employment has not
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	terminated on or before such date or one of the exceptions set forth below in this Section&nbsp;4 are met.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="1" WIDTH="25%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:BLACK;">
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	&#160;To be included for the Senior Management Team.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	&#160;Additional criteria which are solely applicable to Section&nbsp;16 officers are included in Appendix C.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	&#160;Vesting periods and restrictions may be altered for special grants.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	-
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-10_14_HTM_1035-3-KU_PB_1_043108_455">
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
