<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2230876",CP="FLUOR CORPORATION",DN="4",CHK=880242,FOLIO='- 1',FILE="DISK106:[17ZAA3.17ZAA13503]1035-3-KU_ZAA13503.CHC",USER="JVANGB",CD='FEB 16 04:41 2017' -->
<A NAME="eolPage23"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:37.05PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	If your employment with the Company or any of its subsidiaries terminates for any reason other than death, Retirement, Disability or a Qualifying Termination within two (2)&nbsp;years following a Change of Control of the Company, each as determined by the Committee in accordance with the Plan, then as of the date of such termination any RSUs which have yet to vest shall be forfeited by you.&#160; If prior to the RSUs becoming vested in full pursuant to the preceding paragraph, your employment with the Company or any of its subsidiaries terminates by reason of your death, Disability or a Qualifying Termination within two (2)&nbsp;years following a Change of Control of the Company, each as determined by the Committee in accordance with the Plan, then any portion of this RSU Award which has yet to become vested shall become immediately vested.&#160; If prior to the RSUs becoming vested in full pursuant to the preceding paragraph, you Retire from the Company and you deliver a signed non-competition agreement to the Company in a form acceptable to the Company, then any portion of this RSU Award which has yet to become vested shall continue to vest as set forth in the preceding paragraph.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing and regardless of reason for termination, under all circumstances other than your Qualifying Termination within two (2)&nbsp;years following a Change of Control, any RSUs held less than one year from the Grant Date will be forfeited[; provided, however, in the event of your Retirement, this one-year holding requirement may be waived by the Committee, in its sole and absolute discretion, and any portion of this RSU Award which has yet to become vested shall continue to vest as set forth in the preceding paragraph]
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; Nothing in the Plan or this Agreement confers any right of continuing employment with the Company or its subsidiaries.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, if in the event of a Change of Control the successor to the Company does not assume this RSU Award, then any portion of this RSU Award which has yet to become vested and which has not otherwise been forfeited pursuant to the provisions of this Section&nbsp;4 shall become immediately vested.&#160;
<FONT COLOR="BLACK" STYLE="COLOR:BLACK;">
	Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, in the event your employment is terminated for Cause (as defined herein), regardless of whether you are retirement eligible, you will forfeit your right to receive any unvested RSUs, unless otherwise prohibited by law.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	For purposes of this Agreement, &#147;
<B>
	Retirement
</B>
	&#148; shall mean your retirement as determined in accordance with applicable Company personnel policies and the Plan.&#160;
<B>
	&#147;Disability&#148;
</B>
	and
<B>
	&#147;Change of Control&#148;
</B>
	shall have the meanings given to them in Appendix B to this Agreement.&#160; In connection with a Change of Control, the term &#147;
<B>
	Qualifying Termination
</B>
	&#148; means your involuntary termination of employment by the Company without Cause or your resignation for Good Reason.&#160; For this purpose, &#147;
<B>
	Cause
</B>
	&#148; means your dishonesty, fraud, willful misconduct, breach of fiduciary duty, conflict of interest, commission of a felony, material failure or refusal to perform your job duties in accordance with Company policies, a material violation of Company policy that causes harm to the Company or its subsidiaries or other wrongful conduct of a similar nature and degree; and &#147;
<B>
	Good Reason
</B>
	&#148; means a material diminution of your compensation (including, without limitation, base compensation, annual bonus opportunities, and/or equity incentive compensation opportunities), a material diminution of your authority, duties or responsibilities, a material diminution in the authority, duties or responsibilities of the supervisor to whom you are required to report or a material diminution of the budget over which you retain authority; provided, however, that no later than sixty (60) days after learning of the action (or inaction) described herein as the basis for a termination of employment for Good Reason, you must advise the Company in writing that the action (or inaction) constitutes grounds for a termination of your employment for Good Reason, in which event the Company will have thirty (30) days to correct such action (or inaction) (the &#147;
<B>
	Cure Period
</B>
	&#148;) and if such action (or inaction) is timely corrected within the Cure Period, then you will not be entitled to terminate your employment for Good Reason as a result of such action (or inaction). If such action or inaction is not timely corrected within the Cure Period, then you will be entitled to terminate your employment for Good Reason at any time within the one-hundred and twenty (120) day period following expiration of the Cure Period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section&nbsp;5.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TAX WITHHOLDING
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Regardless of any action the Company or the Grantee&#146;s employer (the
<B>
	&#147;Employer&#148;
</B>
	) takes with respect to any or all income tax, social insurance, payroll tax, payment on account or other tax-related withholding (
<B>
	&#147;Tax-Related Items&#148;
</B>
	), the Grantee acknowledges and agrees that the ultimate liability for all Tax-Related Items legally due by the Grantee is and remains the Grantee&#146;s responsibility and that the Company and/or the Employer (i)&nbsp;make no representations nor undertakings regarding the treatment of any Tax-Related Items in connection with any aspect of this grant of RSUs, including the grant and vesting of RSUs, subsequent delivery of Shares and/or cash related to such RSUs or the subsequent sale of any Shares acquired pursuant to such RSUs and receipt of any dividend equivalent payments (if any) and (ii)&nbsp;do not commit to structure the terms or any aspect of this grant of RSUs to reduce or eliminate the Grantee&#146;s liability for Tax-Related Items. The Grantee shall pay the Company or the Employer any amount of Tax-Related Items that the Company or the Employer may be required to withhold as a result of the Grantee&#146;s participation in the Plan or the Grantee&#146;s receipt of RSUs or of Shares pursuant to RSUs that cannot be satisfied by the means described below. Further, if the Grantee is subject to tax in more than one jurisdiction, the Grantee acknowledges that the Company and/or Employer (or former Employer, as applicable) may be required to withhold or account for Tax-Related Items in more than one jurisdiction. The Company may refuse to deliver the Shares if the Grantee fails to comply with the Grantee&#146;s obligations in connection with the Tax-Related Items.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="1" WIDTH="25%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:BLACK;">
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-5.0PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	&#160;Additional provision that may be added for some officers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">

</FONT>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2230876",CP="FLUOR CORPORATION",DN="4",CHK=1005545,FOLIO='- 2',FILE="DISK106:[17ZAA3.17ZAA13503]1035-3-KU_ZAA13503.CHC",USER="JVANGB",CD='FEB 16 04:41 2017' -->
<A NAME="eolPage24"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Prior to the taxable or tax withholding event, as applicable, the Grantee shall pay, or make adequate arrangements satisfactory to the Company or to the Employer (in their sole discretion) to satisfy all Tax-Related Items.&#160; In this regard, the Grantee authorizes the Company or Employer to withhold all applicable Tax-Related Items legally payable by the Grantee by (1)&nbsp;withholding a number of Shares otherwise deliverable equal to the Retained Share Amount (as defined below), (2)&nbsp;withholding from the Grantee&#146;s wages or other cash compensation paid by the Company and/or Employer; and/or (3)&nbsp;withholding from proceeds of the sale of Shares acquired upon settlement of the RSUs, either through a voluntary sale or through a sale arranged by the Company (on the Grantee&#146;s behalf pursuant to this authorization), to the extent permitted by the Administrator.&#160; The &#147;
<B>
	Retained Share Amount
</B>
	&#148; shall mean a number of Shares equal to the quotient of the minimum statutory tax withholding obligation of the Company triggered by the RSUs on the relevant date, divided by the fair market value of one Share on the relevant date or as otherwise provided in the Plan.&#160; If the obligation for Tax-Related Items is satisfied by withholding a number of Shares as described herein, the Grantee understands that he or she will be deemed to have been issued the full number of Shares subject to the settled RSUs, notwithstanding that a number of Shares are held back solely for the purpose of paying the Tax-Related Items due as a result of the settlement of the RSUs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Grantee acknowledges and understands that Grantee should consult a tax advisor regarding Grantee&#146;s tax obligations prior to such settlement or disposition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section&nbsp;6.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SEVERABILITY
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	In the event that one or more of the provisions of this Agreement are invalidated for any reason by a court of competent jurisdiction, any provision so invalidated will be deemed to be separable from the other provisions hereof, and the remaining provisions hereof will continue to be valid and fully enforceable.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section&nbsp;7.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	DATA PROTECTION
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:37.05PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	THE GRANTEE HEREBY EXPLICITLY AND UNAMBIGUOUSLY CONSENTS TO THE COLLECTION, USE AND TRANSFER,&nbsp;IN ELECTRONIC OR OTHER FORM, OF THE GRANTEE&#146;S PERSONAL DATA AS DESCRIBED IN THIS DOCUMENT BY AND AMONG, AS APPLICABLE, THE EMPLOYER, AND THE COMPANY AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES FOR THE EXCLUSIVE PURPOSE OF IMPLEMENTING, ADMINISTERING AND MANAGING THE GRANTEE&#146;S PARTICIPATION IN THE PLAN. THE GRANTEE UNDERSTANDS THAT THE COMPANY,&nbsp;ITS SUBSIDIARIES AND THE EMPLOYER HOLD CERTAIN PERSONAL INFORMATION ABOUT THE GRANTEE,&nbsp;INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, NAME, HOME ADDRESS AND TELEPHONE NUMBER, DATE OF BIRTH, SOCIAL SECURITY OR INSURANCE NUMBER OR OTHER IDENTIFICATION NUMBER, SALARY, NATIONALITY, JOB TITLE, ANY SHARES OR DIRECTORSHIPS HELD IN THE COMPANY, DETAILS OF ALL OPTIONS OR ANY OTHER ENTITLEMENT TO SHARES AWARDED, CANCELED, PURCHASED, EXERCISED, VESTED, UNVESTED OR OUTSTANDING IN THE GRANTEE&#146;S FAVOR FOR THE PURPOSE OF IMPLEMENTING, MANAGING AND ADMINISTERING THE PLAN (&#147;DATA&#148;).&#160; THE GRANTEE UNDERSTANDS THAT THE DATA MAY&nbsp;BE TRANSFERRED TO ANY THIRD PARTIES ASSISTING IN THE IMPLEMENTATION, ADMINISTRATION AND MANAGEMENT OF THE PLAN, THAT THESE RECIPIENTS MAY&nbsp;BE LOCATED IN THE GRANTEE&#146;S COUNTRY OR ELSEWHERE,&nbsp;INCLUDING OUTSIDE THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC AREA, AND THAT THE RECIPIENT COUNTRY MAY&nbsp;HAVE DIFFERENT DATA PRIVACY LAWS AND PROTECTIONS THAN THE GRANTEE&#146;S COUNTRY. THE GRANTEE UNDERSTANDS THAT HE/SHE MAY&nbsp;REQUEST A LIST WITH THE NAMES AND ADDRESSES OF ANY POTENTIAL RECIPIENTS OF THE DATA BY CONTACTING THE LOCAL HUMAN RESOURCES REPRESENTATIVE. THE GRANTEE AUTHORIZES THE RECIPIENTS TO RECEIVE, POSSESS, USE, RETAIN AND TRANSFER THE DATA,&nbsp;IN ELECTRONIC OR OTHER FORM, FOR THE PURPOSES OF IMPLEMENTING, ADMINISTERING AND MANAGING THE GRANTEE&#146;S PARTICIPATION IN THE PLAN,&nbsp;INCLUDING ANY REQUISITE TRANSFER OF SUCH DATA, AS MAY&nbsp;BE REQUIRED TO A BROKER OR OTHER THIRD PARTY WITH WHOM THE GRANTEE MAY&nbsp;ELECT TO DEPOSIT ANY SHARES ACQUIRED UNDER THE PLAN. THE GRANTEE UNDERSTANDS THAT DATA WILL BE HELD ONLY AS LONG AS IS NECESSARY TO IMPLEMENT, ADMINISTER AND MANAGE PARTICIPATION IN THE PLAN. THE GRANTEE UNDERSTANDS THAT HE/SHE MAY, AT ANY TIME, VIEW DATA, REQUEST ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ABOUT THE STORAGE AND PROCESSING OF THE DATA, REQUIRE ANY NECESSARY AMENDMENTS TO THE DATA OR REFUSE OR WITHDRAW THE CONSENTS HEREIN,&nbsp;IN ANY CASE WITHOUT COST, BY CONTACTING THE LOCAL HUMAN RESOURCES REPRESENTATIVE IN WRITING. THE GRANTEE UNDERSTANDS THAT REFUSING OR WITHDRAWING CONSENT MAY&nbsp;AFFECT THE GRANTEE&#146;S ABILITY TO PARTICIPATE IN THE PLAN. FOR MORE INFORMATION ON THE CONSEQUENCES OF REFUSING TO CONSENT OR WITHDRAWING CONSENT, THE GRANTEE UNDERSTANDS THAT HE/SHE MAY&nbsp;CONTACT THE STOCK PLAN ADMINISTRATOR AT THE COMPANY.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section&nbsp;8.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ACKNOWLEDGMENT AND WAIVER
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	By accepting this grant of RSUs, the Grantee acknowledges and agrees that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	the Plan is established voluntarily by the Company, it is discretionary in nature and may be modified, amended, suspended or terminated by the Company at any time unless otherwise provided in the Plan or this Agreement;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	the grant of RSUs is voluntary and occasional and does not create any contractual or other right to receive future grants of Shares or RSUs, or benefits in lieu of Shares or RSUs, even if Shares or RSUs have been granted repeatedly in the past;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	all decisions with respect to future grants, if any, will be at the sole discretion of the Company;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	the Grantee&#146;s participation in the Plan will not create a right to further employment with Employer and will not interfere with the ability of Employer to terminate the Grantee&#146;s employment relationship and it is expressly agreed and understood that employment is terminable at the will of either party, insofar as permitted by law;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	the Grantee is participating voluntarily in the Plan;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	RSU awards and resulting benefits are an extraordinary item that does not constitute compensation of any kind for services of any kind rendered to the Company or the Employer, and are outside the scope of the Grantee&#146;s employment contract, if any;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(g)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	RSU awards and resulting benefits are not part of normal or expected compensation or salary for any purposes, including, but not limited to calculating any severance, resignation, termination, redundancy, end of service payments, bonuses, long-service awards, pension or retirement benefits or similar payments insofar as permitted by law;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(h)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	in the event that the Grantee is not an employee of the Company, this award of RSUs will not be interpreted to form an employment contract or relationship with the Company, and furthermore, this award of RSUs will not be interpreted to form an employment contract with the Employer or any subsidiary of the Company;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	the future value of the Shares is unknown, may increase or decrease from the date of award or vesting of the RSU and cannot be predicted with certainty; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(j)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	in consideration of this grant of RSUs, no claim or entitlement to compensation or damages shall arise from termination of this grant of RSUs or diminution in value of this grant of RSUs resulting from termination of the Grantee&#146;s employment by the Company or the Employer (for any reason whatsoever) and the Grantee irrevocably releases the Company and the Employer from any such claim that may arise; if, notwithstanding the foregoing, any such claim is found by a court of competent jurisdiction to have arisen, then, by accepting the terms of this Agreement, the Grantee shall be deemed irrevocably to have waived any entitlement to pursue such claim.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

</FONT>
</P>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	This Agreement and the receipt of any RSUs hereunder are conditioned upon Grantee not disclosing this Agreement or said receipt to anyone other than Grantee&#146;s spouse, financial advisor, senior management of the Company or members of the Company&#146;s Law, Tax, and Human Resources departments. If unauthorized disclosure is made to any other person, the RSUs received hereunder will be forfeited.

<A NAME="eolPage27"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	APPENDIX A
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	FLUOR CORPORATION
<BR>
	RESTRICTED STOCK UNIT AWARD
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	UNDER THE AMENDED&nbsp;&amp; RESTATED 2008 EXECUTIVE PERFORMANCE INCENTIVE PLAN
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TERMS FOR NON-U.S. GRANTEES
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TERMS AND CONDITIONS
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	This Appendix A, which is part of the Agreement, includes additional terms and conditions of the Agreement that will apply to you if you are a resident in one of the countries listed below.&#160; Capitalized terms used but not defined herein shall have the same meanings assigned to them in the Plan and the Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTIFICATIONS
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	This Appendix A also includes information regarding exchange control and certain other issues of which you should be aware with respect to your participation in the Plan.&#160; The information is based on the securities, exchange control and other laws in effect in the respective countries as of January&nbsp;2017.&#160; Such laws are often complex and change frequently.&#160; As a result, the Company strongly recommends that you not rely on the information in this Appendix A as the only source of information relating to the consequences of your participation in the Plan because such information may be out-of-date when your RSUs vest and/or you sell any Shares acquired under the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	In addition, the information contained herein is general in nature and may not apply to your particular situation.&#160; As a result, the Company is not in a position to assure you of any particular result.&#160; You are therefore advised to seek appropriate professional advice as to how the relevant laws in your country may apply to your situation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Finally, if you are a citizen or resident of a country other than that in which you are currently working, the information contained herein may not apply to you.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">

<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Prospectus Information
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; The &#147;Offer Document&#148; and &#147;Australian Rules&#148; contain additional terms and conditions that govern the RSU.&#160; Grantees should review those documents carefully.&#160; In addition, the written or other materials provided to Grantees in connection with the RSUs have been prepared for the purpose of complying with the relevant United States securities regulations and applicable stock exchange requirements.&#160; The information disclosed may not be the same as that which must be disclosed in a prospectus prepared under Australian law.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	RSUs Settled in Shares Only
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in the Plan and/or the Agreement, Grantee understands that RSUs granted to Grantee shall be paid in Shares only and do not provide any right for Grantee to receive a cash payment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;

</FONT>

<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Securities Law Information
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; If Grantee acquires Shares pursuant to the RSU and offers the Shares for sale to a person or entity resident in Australia, the offer may be subject to disclosure requirements under Australian law.&#160; Grantees should obtain legal advice on disclosure obligations prior to making any such offer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Exchange Control Information
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; Exchange control reporting is required for cash transactions exceeding A$10,000 and international fund transfers.&#160; The Australian bank assisting with the transaction will file the report.&#160; If there is no Australian bank involved in the transfer, Grantee will be required to file the report.
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT SIZE="2" COLOR="BLACK" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="COLOR:BLACK;FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

<FONT COLOR="BLACK" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="COLOR:BLACK;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	&#160; Neither the Company, the award, nor any Company shares acquired under the Plan are registered with the Chilean Registry of Securities or are under the control of the Chilean Superintendence of Securities.
<FONT COLOR="BLACK" STYLE="COLOR:BLACK;">
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">

<FONT SIZE="2" COLOR="BLACK" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="COLOR:BLACK;FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Exchange Control Information
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT COLOR="BLACK" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="COLOR:BLACK;">
	.&#160; If exchange control reporting is required , you will be responsible for filing the report with the Central Bank of Chile.&#160; In addition, you must also file a report with the Central Bank if, in a given year, you have kept investments, deposits, or credits abroad in an amount that exceeds US$5,000,000.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="3" COLOR="BLACK" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="COLOR:BLACK;">
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT COLOR="BLACK" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="COLOR:BLACK;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT COLOR="BLACK" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="COLOR:BLACK;">
	&#160; Registration of your investment in Company shares with the Chilean Internal Revenue Service may result in more favorable tax treatment.&#160; Please consult your tax advisor for additional details.

<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; Cross-border payments in excess of EUR12,500 must be reported monthly to the German Federal Bank.&#160; If Grantee uses a German bank to transfer a cross-border payment in excess of EUR12,500 in connection with the sale of Shares acquired under the Plan, the bank will file the report for you.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Notifications
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Insider-Trading Notification
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; Grantees should be aware of the Dutch insider-trading rules, which may impact the sale of Shares acquired upon vesting of the RSU.&#160; In particular, Grantees may be prohibited from effectuating certain transactions involving Shares if they have inside information about the Company.&#160; Grantees should consult their personal legal advisor if they are uncertain whether the insider-trading rules&nbsp;apply to them.&#160; By accepting the Agreement and participating in the Plan, Grantee acknowledges having read and understood this notification and acknowledges that it is his or her responsibility to comply with the Dutch insider-trading rules.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	RUSSIA
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Terms and Conditions
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Securities Law Information
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; Grantee acknowledges that the Agreement, the grant of RSUs, the Plan and all other materials Grantee may receive regarding participation in the Plan do not constitute advertising or an offering of securities in Russia.&#160; The issuance of securities pursuant to the Plan has not and will not be registered in Russia and therefore, the securities described in any Plan-related documents may not be used for offering or public circulation in Russia.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Grantee further acknowledges that in no event will Shares acquired upon vesting of the RSUs be delivered to Grantee in Russia; all Shares acquired upon vesting of the RSUs will be maintained on Grantee&#146;s behalf in the United States.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Grantee&#160; acknowledges that Grantee is not permitted to sell Shares directly to a Russian legal entity or resident.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Grantee understands that Grantee is solely liable for all applicable Russian exchange control requirements (including repatriation requirements applicable to the proceeds from the sale of Shares).
</FONT>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Exchange Control Information
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; To participate in the Plan, Grantee understands that Grantee must comply with exchange control regulations and rulings (the &#147;Exchange Control Regulations&#148;) in South Africa.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	For RSUs, because no transfer of funds from South Africa is required, no filing or reporting requirements should apply when the RSUs, if any, are granted or when shares are issued upon vesting and settlement of the RSUs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Because the Exchange Control Regulations change frequently and without notice, Grantee understands that Grantee should consult a legal advisor prior to the purchase or sale of shares under the Plan to ensure compliance with current regulations.&#160; Grantee understands that it is Grantee&#146;s responsibility to comply with South African exchange control laws, and neither the Company nor Grantee&#146;s Employer will be liable for any fines or penalties resulting from failure to comply with applicable laws.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Notifications
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	No Special Employment or Similar Rights
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; Grantee understands that the Company has unilaterally, gratuitously, and discretionally decided to distribute awards under the Plan to individuals who may be employees of the Company or its subsidiaries throughout the world.&#160; The decision is a temporary decision that is entered into upon the express assumption and condition that any grant will not economically or otherwise bind the Company or any of its subsidiaries presently or in the future, other than as specifically set forth in the Plan and the terms and conditions of Grantee&#146;s RSU grant.&#160; Consequently, Grantee understands that any grant is given on the assumption and condition that it shall not become a part of any employment contract (either with the Company or any of its subsidiaries) and shall not be considered a mandatory benefit, salary for any purpose (including severance compensation) or any other right whatsoever.&#160; Further, Grantee understands and freely accepts that there is no guarantee that any benefit whatsoever shall arise from any gratuitous and discretionary grant since the future value of the awards and underlying shares is unknown and unpredictable.&#160; In addition, Grantee understands that this grant would not be made but for the assumptions and conditions referred to above; thus, Grantee acknowledges and freely accepts that should any or all of the assumptions be mistaken or should any of the conditions not be met for any reason, then any grant of awards shall be null and void and the Plan shall not have any effect whatsoever.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Further, the RSU Award provides a conditional right to Shares and may be forfeited or affected by Grantee&#146;s termination of employment, as set forth in the Agreement.&#160; For avoidance of doubt, Grantee&#146;s rights, if any, to the RSUs upon termination of employment shall be determined as set forth in the Agreement, including, without limitation, where (i)&nbsp;Grantee is considered to be unfairly dismissed without good cause; (ii)&nbsp;Grantee is dismissed for disciplinary or objective reasons or due to a collective dismissal; (iii)&nbsp;Grantee terminates service due to a change location, duties or any other employment or contractual condition; or (iv)&nbsp;Grantee terminates service due to the Company&#146;s or any of its subsidiaries&#146; unilateral breach of contract.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Securities Law Notice
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; The RSUs granted under the Plan do not qualify as securities under Spanish regulations.&#160; By the grant of RSUs, no &#147;offer of securities to the public&#148;, as defined under Spanish law, has taken place or will take place in Spanish territory.&#160; The present document and any other document relating to the offer of RSUs under the Plan has not been nor will it be registered with the Comisi&#243;n Nacional del Mercado de Valores (Spanish Securities Exchange Commission), and it does not constitute a public offering prospectus.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Reporting Requirements
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	.&#160; Grantee is responsible for complying with all reporting requirements applicable to holding the RSUs and the underlying Shares.
</FONT>

<A NAME="eolPage31"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	APPENDIX B
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Compliance with Section&nbsp;409A of the Internal Revenue Code
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	It is intended that the provisions of this Agreement comply with Section&nbsp;409A of the U.S. Internal Revenue Code (&#147;Section&nbsp;409A&#148;), and all provisions of this Agreement shall be construed and interpreted in a manner consistent with the requirements for avoiding taxes or penalties under Section&nbsp;409A.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	Neither Grantee nor any of Grantee&#146;s creditors or beneficiaries shall have the right to subject any deferred compensation (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;409A) payable under this Agreement to any anticipation, alienation, sale, transfer, assignment, pledge, encumbrance, attachment or garnishment.&#160; Except as permitted under Section&nbsp;409A, any deferred compensation (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;409A) payable to Grantee or for Grantee&#146;s benefit under this Agreement may not be reduced by, or offset against, any amount owing by Grantee to the Company or any of its subsidiaries.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	If, at the time of Grantee&#146;s separation from service (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;409A), (i)&nbsp;Grantee is a specified employee (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;409A and using the identification methodology selected by the Company from time to time) and (ii)&nbsp;the Company shall make a good faith determination that an amount payable hereunder constitutes deferred compensation (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;409A) the payment of which is required to be delayed pursuant to the six-month delay rule&nbsp;set forth in Section&nbsp;409A in order to avoid taxes or penalties under Section&nbsp;409A, then the Company shall not pay such amount on the otherwise scheduled payment date pursuant to Section&nbsp;4 of this Agreement but shall instead pay it, without interest, on the first business day after such six-month period or, if earlier, upon the Grantee&#146;s death.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein, for the purpose of this Agreement, (i)&nbsp;if the RSUs have not previously been forfeited, the RSUs shall vest on a Disability, which shall mean that the Grantee is considered disabled in accordance with U.S. Treasury Regulations section 1.409A-3(i)(4), determined as if all permissible provisions of such regulation were in effect, and (ii)&nbsp;a Change of Control of the Company is considered to have occurred with respect to the Grantee upon the occurrence with respect to the Grantee of a change in the ownership or effective control of the Company or a change in the ownership of a substantial portion of the assets of the Company, as determined in accordance with U.S. Treasury Regulations section 1.409A-3(i)(5).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	Notwithstanding any provision of this Agreement to the contrary, in light of the uncertainty with respect to the proper application of Section&nbsp;409A, the Company reserves the right to make amendments to this Agreement as the Company deems necessary or desirable to avoid the imposition of taxes or penalties under Section&nbsp;409A.&#160; In any case, Grantee shall be solely responsible and liable for the satisfaction of all taxes and penalties that may be imposed on Grantee or for Grantee&#146;s account in connection with this Agreement (including, without limitation, any taxes and penalties under Section&nbsp;409A), and neither the Company nor any of its subsidiaries shall have any obligation to indemnify or otherwise hold Grantee harmless from any or all of such taxes or penalties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	-

<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-10_14_HTM_1035-3-KU_PB_10_043109_3641">

<BR>
<DIV>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit 10.22
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	FLUOR CORPORATION
<BR>
	409A DIRECTOR DEFERRED COMPENSATION PROGRAM
<BR>
	(As Amended and Restated Effective as of November&nbsp;2, 2016)
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	THIS INSTRUMENT, made effective as of November&nbsp;2, 2016 (the &#147;
<B>
	Effective Date
</B>
	&#148;) by Fluor Corporation, a Delaware corporation (the &#147;
<B>
	Company
</B>
	&#148;), evidences the continuation of the Fluor Corporation 409A Director Deferred Compensation Program, formerly named the Fluor Corporation 409A Deferred Directors&#146; Fees Program (the &#147;
<B>
	Plan
</B>
	&#148;), adopted for the benefit of its non-employee directors.&#160; The Plan will be interpreted in a manner consistent with Code Section&nbsp;409A, the final regulations issued thereunder, and any other applicable guidance from the Internal Revenue Service.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	WITNESSETH:
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	WHEREAS
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	, the Company has previously established the Plan; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	WHEREAS
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	, the Company amended and restated the Plan effective January&nbsp;1, 2015 to permit directors to defer all or a portion of their restricted stock units and associated dividends awarded under the Fluor Corporation 2014 Restricted Stock Plan for Non-Employee Directors (as amended, modified, or supplemented from time to time) and to change the name of the Plan to the Fluor Corporation 409A Director Deferred Compensation Program; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	WHEREAS
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	, the Company desires to amend the Plan so that all cash dividends paid with respect to restricted stock units deferred under the Plan are automatically deemed invested in the stock equivalent fund established under this Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOW, THEREFORE
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	, the Company hereby declares the current terms and conditions of the Plan to be, as of November&nbsp;2, 2016, as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;1
<BR>
	PURPOSE
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	The primary purpose of the Plan is to provide certain of the Company&#146;s non-employee directors with an opportunity to defer receipt of fees and/or settlement of restricted stock units awarded to them for services rendered to the Company in a manner that complies with Section&nbsp;409A of the Code.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;2
<BR>
	DEFINITIONS
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Whenever used herein, the following terms will have the meanings set forth below, and, when the defined meaning is intended, the term is capitalized:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Administrative Committee
</B>
	&#148; means the Administrative Committee appointed by the Organization and Compensation Committee to administer the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Beneficiary
</B>
	&#148; means the individual designated pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.5.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Board
</B>
	&#148; or &#147;
<B>
	Board of Directors
</B>
	&#148; means the Board of Directors of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Page
</FONT>

	1
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	of 16

</FONT>

<A NAME="eolPage34"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Change in Control
</B>
	&#148; means an event described in Treasury Regulation 1.409A-3(a)(5), including, without limitation:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; a change in ownership of the Company as a result of a person, or more than one person acting as a group acquiring ownership that in the aggregate constitutes more than fifty percent (50%) of the total fair market value of the Company (this provision does not apply to a person or group already possessing more than fifty percent (50%) of the total fair market value of the Company); or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; a change in effective control of the Company as a result of a person or more than one person acting as a group acquiring (or has acquired during the 12-month period ending on the date of the most recent acquisition by such person or group) ownership of stock of the Company possessing more than thirty percent (30%) of the total voting power of the stock of the Company; or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; a change in effective control of the Company as a result of the majority of members of the Company&#146;s board of directors being replaced during any 12-month period by directors whose appointment or election is not endorsed by a majority of the members of the Company&#146;s board of directors before the date of the appointment or election; or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(iv)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; a change in ownership of a substantial portion of the Company&#146;s assets as a result of a person or more than one person acting as a group acquiring (or has acquired during the 12-month period ending on the date of the most recent acquisition by such person or persons) assets from the Company that have a total gross fair market value equal to more than forty percent (40%) of the total gross fair market value of all of the assets of the Company immediately before such acquisition or acquisitions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Code
</B>
	&#148; means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended from time to time.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Company
</B>
	&#148; means Fluor Corporation, a Delaware corporation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Controlled Group
</B>
	&#148; means (i)&nbsp;any company which is a member of a controlled group of corporations, as defined in section 414(b)&nbsp;of the Code, which controlled group includes the Company; (ii)&nbsp;any trade or business under common control as defined in section 414(c)&nbsp;of the Code with the Company; (iii)&nbsp;any organization (whether or not incorporated) which is a member of an affiliated service group that includes the Company or any entity described in (i)&nbsp;or (ii)&nbsp;above; and (iv)&nbsp;any other entity required to be aggregated with the Company or any other entity described in (i), (ii)&nbsp;or (iii)&nbsp;above pursuant to regulations under section 414(o)&nbsp;of the Code.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(h)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Crediting Options
</B>
	&#148; means the investment options selected by the Administrative Committee for the purpose of determining gains and/or losses to Participant Fee Deferral Accounts, as modified from time to time as described in Section&nbsp;6.2.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Page
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	of 16
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-10_22_HTM_1035-3-LG-01_PB_2_111750_7056">
</A>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2230876",CP="FLUOR CORPORATION",DN="5",CHK=95788,FOLIO='PAGE 2',FILE="DISK106:[17ZAA3.17ZAA13503]1035-3-LG-01_ZAA13503.CHC",USER="JVANGB",CD='FEB 11 11:32 2017' -->
<A NAME="eolPage35"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Deferral Accounts
</B>
	&#148; means the Fee Deferral Account, the RSU Deferral Account and the RSU Dividend Deferral Account.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(j)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Director&#146;s Fees
</B>
	&#148; means cash amounts payable to a director for the Plan Year for the director&#146;s service on the Board for such Plan Year including, without limitation, annual retainer fees, committee chair retainer fees and meeting fees.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(k)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Directors Restricted Stock Plan
</B>
	&#148; means the Fluor Corporation 2014 Restricted Stock Plan for Non-Employee Directors, as amended, modified, supplemented or replaced from time to time.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(l)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Director&#146;s RSUs
</B>
	&#148; means the restricted stock units awarded to a director for the Plan Year for the director&#146;s service on the Board for such Plan Year under the Directors Restricted Stock Plan, the provisions of which permit deferral under this Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(m)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Disability
</B>
	&#148; means a physical or mental medical condition such that the Participant is unable to engage in any substantial gainful employment and the condition is reasonably expected to result in death or to last continuously for at least 12 months.&#160; The Administrative Committee will make the determination of Disability in its sole discretion based on available medical information.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(n)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Election Form
</B>
	&#148; means the form filed by an Eligible Director pursuant to which he or she consents to participation in the Plan and elects to defer Director&#146;s Fees and/or Director&#146;s RSUs under the Plan.&#160; Each Election Form&nbsp;will specify the form of distribution (i.e., lump sum or installment payments) and with respect to Fee Deferrals will specify the time of distribution (upon Termination of Service or a specified year). The Election Form&nbsp;may be completed either in writing or on-line through an electronic signature.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(o)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Eligible Director
</B>
	&#148; means a director who is eligible to participate in the Plan pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.1.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(p)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Fair Market Value
</B>
	&#148; means the closing sales price of the Company&#146;s common stock for such day, as reported on the New York Stock Exchange.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(q)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Fee Deferral Account
</B>
	&#148; means the separate bookkeeping account maintained with respect to a Participant&#146;s Fee Deferrals.&#160; The Plan Administrator may maintain separate bookkeeping accounts with respect to Fee Deferrals for each Plan Year and/or may combine such accounts as it deems appropriate.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(r)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Fee Deferrals
</B>
	&#148; means the deferral of Director&#146;s Fees made by a Participant under the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(s)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Matching Contributions
</B>
	&#148; means those contributions made by the Company prior to January&nbsp;1, 2013 to the Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.2 of the Fluor Corporation 409A Deferred Directors&#146; Fees Program effective as of January&nbsp;1, 2005.&#160; In addition, Matching Contributions under the Plan will also include any such contributions made under the Fluor Corporation Deferred Directors&#146; Fees Program.&#160; Matching Contributions were discontinued effective January&nbsp;1, 2013.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Page
</FONT>

	of 16

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(t)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	&#147;Organization and Compensation Committee&#148;
</B>
	means the Organization and Compensation Committee of the Board.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
