<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(u)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Participant
</B>
	&#148; means an Eligible Director who is participating in the Plan pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.2.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(v)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Plan
</B>
	&#148; means the Fluor Corporation 409A Director Deferred Compensation Program, as set forth herein, and as it may be amended from time to time.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(w)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Plan Administrator
</B>
	&#148; means the individual appointed by the Administrative Committee to handle the day-to-day administration of the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(x)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Plan Year
</B>
	&#148; means January&nbsp;1 to December&nbsp;31 of each calendar year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(y)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Post-2016 RSU Dividend Deferral Account
</B>
	&#148; means the separate bookkeeping account maintained with respect to a Participant&#146;s Post-2016 RSU Dividend Deferrals.&#160; The Plan Administrator may maintain separate bookkeeping accounts with respect to Post-2016 RSU Dividend Deferrals for each Plan Year and/or may combine such accounts as it deems appropriate.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(z)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Post-2016 RSU Dividend Deferrals
</B>
	&#148; means the automatic deferral of cash dividends with respect to Director RSUs that are deferred by a Participant under the Plan during and after the enrollment period in 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(aa)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Pre-2017 RSU Dividend Deferral Account
</B>
	&#148; means the separate bookkeeping account maintained with respect to a Participant&#146;s Pre-2017 RSU Dividend Deferrals.&#160; The Plan Administrator may maintain separate bookkeeping accounts with respect to Pre-2017 RSU Dividend Deferrals for each Plan Year and/or may combine such accounts as it deems appropriate.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(bb)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Pre-2017 RSU Dividend Deferrals
</B>
	&#148; means the automatic deferral of cash dividends with respect to Director RSUs that were deferred by a Participant before the enrollment period in 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(cc)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	RSU Deferral Account
</B>
	&#148; means the separate bookkeeping account maintained with respect to a Participant&#146;s RSU Deferrals.&#160; The Plan Administrator may maintain separate bookkeeping accounts with respect to RSU Deferrals for each Plan Year and/or may combine such accounts as it deems appropriate.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(dd)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	RSU Deferrals
</B>
	&#148; means the deferral of Director&#146;s RSUs made by a Participant under the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(ee)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	RSU Dividend Deferral Account
</B>
	&#148; means the Pre-2017 RSU Dividend Deferral Account and the Post-2016 Dividend Deferral Account.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(ff)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	RSU Dividend Deferrals
</B>
	&#148; means the automatic deferral of cash dividends paid with respect to Director&#146;s RSUs deferred by a Participant under the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(gg)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Stock Equivalent Fund
</B>
	&#148; means the fund established pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.3.
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=4,EFW="2230876",CP="FLUOR CORPORATION",DN="5",CHK=91352,FOLIO='PAGE 4',FILE="DISK106:[17ZAA3.17ZAA13503]1035-3-LG-01_ZAA13503.CHC",USER="JVANGB",CD='FEB 11 11:32 2017' -->
<A NAME="eolPage37"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(hh)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Stock Equivalents
</B>
	&#148; means a measure of value equal to one share of the Company&#146;s common stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;
<B>
	Termination of Service
</B>
	&#148; means the date an Eligible Director (i)&nbsp;ceases to provide services to the Company as a member of the Board, and (ii)&nbsp;does not provide any services to the Company and its Controlled Group Members in any other capacity such as an independent contractor or employee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;3
<BR>
	ADMINISTRATION
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3.1
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Authority of the Administrative Committee.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;The Administrative Committee will administer the Plan.&#160; The members of the Administrative Committee will be appointed by and will serve at the discretion of the Organization and Compensation Committee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Subject to the provisions herein, the Administrative Committee will have full power and discretion to:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; determine a director&#146;s eligibility to participate in the Plan;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; determine the terms and conditions of each director&#146;s participation in the Plan;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; construe and interpret the Plan and any agreement or instrument entered into under the Plan;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; compute and certify to the amount and kind of benefits payable to Participants or their Beneficiaries;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; maintain all records that may be necessary for the administration of the Plan;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; provide for the disclosure of all information and the filing or provision of all reports and statements to Participants, Beneficiaries, or governmental agencies as the Administrative Committee may determine or as required by law;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; establish, amend, or waive rules&nbsp;and regulations for the Plan&#146;s administration;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(h)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; appoint the Plan Administrator or any other agent, and to delegate to such person such powers and duties in connection with the administration of the Plan as the Administrative Committee may from time to time prescribe; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; make other determinations which may be necessary or advisable for the administration of the Plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3.2
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Decisions Binding.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;All determinations and decisions of the Administrative Committee as to any disputed question arising under the Plan, including questions of construction and interpretation, will be final, conclusive, and binding on all parties and will be given the maximum possible deference allowed by law.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Page
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	of 16
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-10_22_HTM_1035-3-LG-01_PB_5_111826_2897">
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=5,EFW="2230876",CP="FLUOR CORPORATION",DN="5",CHK=443099,FOLIO='PAGE 5',FILE="DISK106:[17ZAA3.17ZAA13503]1035-3-LG-01_ZAA13503.CHC",USER="JVANGB",CD='FEB 11 11:32 2017' -->
<A NAME="eolPage38"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;4
<BR>
	ELIGIBILITY AND PARTICIPATION
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.1
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Eligibility.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;The Administrative Committee will determine, in its sole and absolute discretion, which such directors will be eligible to participate in the Plan, and may modify such determinations at any time, provided that at all times the Plan will continue to qualify as an unfunded deferred compensation plan.&#160; To be eligible to participate in the Plan, a director must be a non-employee director serving on the Board and entitled to Director&#146;s Fees and/or Director&#146;s RSUs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.2
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Participation and Deferral Election.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;Each Eligible Director will become a Participant in the Plan upon his or her election to defer Director&#146;s Fees and/or Director&#146;s RSUs hereunder.&#160; A Director who elects to defer Director&#146;s RSUs will automatically be deemed to have elected to defer any dividends paid on such Director&#146;s RSUs as RSU Dividend Deferrals.&#160; Eligible Directors and Participants will make their elections to defer all or a portion of their Director&#146;s Fees and/or Director&#146;s RSUs for the Plan Year by completing an Election Form&nbsp;during the applicable enrollment period (as determined by the Plan Administrator) in the Plan Year prior to the Plan Year the Director&#146;s Fees are earned and otherwise payable and/or Director&#146;s RSUs are awarded.&#160; Except as provided in Section&nbsp;5.3, an election under this Section&nbsp;4.2 will be irrevocable after December&nbsp;31 of the Plan Year prior to the Plan Year the Director&#146;s Fees are earned and otherwise payable and/or Director&#146;s RSUs are awarded.&#160; A separate Election Form&nbsp;is required for each Plan Year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	In the event a Participant ceases to be eligible to participate in the Plan, such Participant will become an inactive Participant, retaining all the rights described under the Plan, except the right to make any further deferrals, until such time that the Participant again becomes an active Participant.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.3
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Initial Year Eligibility.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;In the event that a director first becomes eligible to participate in the Plan after the beginning of a Plan Year, the Company will notify the director of his or her eligibility to participate, and the Company will provide the Eligible Director with an Election Form; provided, however, that such director must make his or her deferral election within 30 days of the determination that he or she is an Eligible Director and may elect only to defer Director&#146;s Fees and/or Director&#146;s RSUs for such Plan Year which are to be earned or awarded after the filing of the&#160; Election Form.&#160; Except as provided in Section&nbsp;5.3, an election under this Section&nbsp;4.3 will be irrevocable with respect to the Plan Year for which the election is made.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.4
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Notice.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;The Company will notify a director within a reasonable time of such director&#146;s gaining or losing eligibility for active participation in the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;5
<BR>
	DEFERRAL AND DISTRIBUTION ELECTIONS
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	5.1
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Director Deferral Elections.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;Subject to Section&nbsp;4.2 and 4.3, an Eligible Director may elect to make two types of deferrals under the Plan:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Fee Deferrals, and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; RSU Deferrals.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Page
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	of 16
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-10_22_HTM_1035-3-LG-01_PB_6_111831_3020">
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=6,EFW="2230876",CP="FLUOR CORPORATION",DN="5",CHK=476819,FOLIO='PAGE 6',FILE="DISK106:[17ZAA3.17ZAA13503]1035-3-LG-01_ZAA13503.CHC",USER="JVANGB",CD='FEB 11 11:32 2017' -->
<A NAME="eolPage39"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	The Eligible Director may elect to defer for any Plan Year, in percentage increments of one percent (1%), up to one hundred percent (100%) of his or her Director&#146;s Fees and/or Director&#146;s RSUs.&#160; An Eligible Director who elects to defer Director&#146;s RSUs will be deemed to have automatically elected to defer any dividends paid on such Director&#146;s RSUs as RSU Dividend Deferrals.&#160; Fee Deferrals will be credited to the Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account, RSU Deferrals will be credited to the Participant&#146;s RSU Deferral Account and RSU Dividend Deferrals will be credited to the Participant&#146;s Pre-2017 or Post-2016 RSU Dividend Deferral Account, as applicable, pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.1.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Director&#146;s RSUs and the associated dividends deferred pursuant to this Section&nbsp;5.1 will continue to be subject to the underlying grant agreement to the extent the terms of such agreement do not conflict with the terms of the Plan and the Participant&#146;s RSU Deferral election (e.g., the deferral and settlement provisions of this Plan, rather than the grant agreement, will govern the settlement of the Director&#146;s RSUs; however, the vesting schedule in the grant agreement will continue to apply).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	5.2
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Director Initial Distribution Elections.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;At the time of deferral, an Eligible Director may elect to defer distribution of his or her Fee Deferrals until the
<B>
	earliest
</B>
	of (a)&nbsp;a date certain or (b)&nbsp;the Eligible Director&#146;s Termination of Service, as applicable.&#160; Conversely, the distribution of RSU Deferrals (and the associated RSU Dividend Deferrals) may only be deferred until the Eligible Director&#146;s Termination of Service.&#160; An Eligible Director may elect to receive his or her Fee Deferrals and RSU Deferrals in either: (i)&nbsp;a single lump sum payment, or (ii)&nbsp;annual installment payments over a period of two to 10 years.&#160; Director&#146;s RSU Dividend Deferrals will be paid in the same form as the RSU Deferrals to which they relate (i.e
<I>
	.
</I>
	, if the Director elects installments over five years with respect to his or her 2015 Director&#146;s RSU Deferrals, the associated RSU Dividend Deferrals for such Plan Year will also be paid in five-year installments).&#160; Fee Deferrals and RSU Dividend Deferrals will be paid in cash and RSU Deferrals will be settled in Company common stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	5.3
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Director Subsequent Deferral Elections.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;If a Participant wishes to modify the distribution date or form of distribution (i.e., lump sum or installments) for his or her Fee Deferrals for a particular Plan Year, the Participant must submit a distribution election change form for such change.&#160; The form must be submitted at least 12 months prior to the first scheduled payment, will not take effect until 12 months after the date on which the election is made, and must provide that the payment be deferred at least five years from the date such payment would otherwise have been made.&#160; A Participant may not elect to modify the distribution date or form of distribution for his or her RSU Deferrals or RSU Dividend Deferrals.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;6
<BR>
	DEFERRAL ACCOUNTS AND CREDITING OPTIONS
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	6.1
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Participants&#146; Accounts.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;The Company will establish and maintain the following Deferral Accounts:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; a Fee Deferral Account,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; an RSU Deferral Account,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; a Pre-2017 RSU Dividend Deferral Account, and/or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; a Post-2016 RSU Dividend Deferral Account.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Page
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	of 16
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-10_22_HTM_1035-3-LG-01_PB_7_111840_7748">
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=7,EFW="2230876",CP="FLUOR CORPORATION",DN="5",CHK=937007,FOLIO='PAGE 7',FILE="DISK106:[17ZAA3.17ZAA13503]1035-3-LG-01_ZAA13503.CHC",USER="JVANGB",CD='FEB 11 11:32 2017' -->
<A NAME="eolPage40"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	The Fee Deferral Account will be deemed invested in the Crediting Options as provided in Section&nbsp;6.2.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	The Director&#146;s RSUs deferred by a Participant under this Plan will be granted under the Directors Restricted Stock Plan and the RSU Deferral Account and the RSU Dividend Deferral Account will be governed by the terms of the Directors Restricted Stock Plan until the underlying Director&#146;s RSUs are vested.&#160; The RSU Deferral Account will be deemed invested in the Stock Equivalent Fund under Section&nbsp;6.3.&#160; The Pre-2017 RSU Dividend Deferral Account will not be deemed invested in the Crediting Options as provided in Section&nbsp;6.2 or the Stock Equivalent Fund as provided in Section&nbsp;6.3, but, rather, will be held in cash.&#160; The Post-2016 RSU Dividend Deferral Account will automatically be deemed invested in the Stock Equivalent Fund as provided in Section&nbsp;6.3.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	6.2
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Crediting Options &#150; Fee Deferral Account.
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;The Administrative Committee is responsible for selecting the Crediting Options under the Plan, one of which options will include the Stock Equivalent Fund described in Section&nbsp;6.3.&#160; The Crediting Options may be changed, modified or deleted, or additional investment options may be added, by the Administrative Committee in its discretion.&#160; The Crediting Options will be used as a measure of the deemed investment performance of the balances of the Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Accounts by the Administrative Committee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	At the time that an Eligible Director first becomes a Participant, the Participant will be required to allocate his or her Fee Deferrals among the Crediting Options available at the time.&#160; Fee Deferrals will be credited to the Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account on the date the Director&#146;s Fees would have been paid to the Participant had the Participant not deferred the Director&#146;s Fees to the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	A Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account will be credited with earnings (or losses) based on the Crediting Options selected by the Participant on a form or in such other manner as the Plan Administrator may prescribe.&#160; Except with respect to deemed investments in the Stock Equivalent Fund, deemed earnings (and losses) on a Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account will be based upon the daily unit valuation of the funds (as determined by the Plan Administrator) selected by the Participant, and will be credited to a Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account on a monthly basis.&#160; Deemed earnings (or losses) will be paid out to a Participant in accordance with the applicable Election Form.&#160; Any portion of a Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account which is subject to distribution in installments will continue to be credited with deemed earnings (or losses) until fully paid out to the Participant.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	A Participant may specify a separate investment allocation with respect to each Plan Year&#146;s Fee Deferrals.&#160; Participants may modify their deemed investment instructions daily with respect to any portion (whole percentages only) of their Fee Deferral Account; provided they notify the Plan Administrator within the time and in the manner specified by the Plan Administrator.&#160; Modifications to investment in the Stock Equivalent Fund may subject the Participant&#146;s account to forfeiture of Matching Contributions made prior to January&nbsp;1, 2013 in accordance with Section&nbsp;6.4.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Page
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	of 16
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-10_22_HTM_1035-3-LG-01_PB_8_112510_141">
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=8,EFW="2230876",CP="FLUOR CORPORATION",DN="5",CHK=225835,FOLIO='PAGE 8',FILE="DISK106:[17ZAA3.17ZAA13503]1035-3-LG-01_ZAA13503.CHC",USER="JVANGB",CD='FEB 11 11:32 2017' -->
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	The Administrative Committee or Plan Administrator may provide additional limitations on the ability of Participants to change their deemed investment instructions regarding deemed investments in the Stock Equivalent Fund to prevent violations of Section&nbsp;16(b)&nbsp;of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, as determined by the Administrative Committee or the Plan Administrator in its sole discretion.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	The Administrative Committee reserves the right to credit earnings (or losses) on a basis different from that elected by the Participants.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	6.3
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Stock Equivalent Fund.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;One of the Crediting Options will be the Stock Equivalent Fund which is a deemed investment in the Company&#146;s common stock.&#160; RSU Deferrals will automatically be deemed invested in the Stock Equivalent Fund.&#160; Pre-2017 Dividend Deferrals will be held in cash and may not be credited to any Crediting Option, including the Stock Equivalent Fund.&#160; Post-2016 RSU Dividend Deferrals will automatically be deemed invested in the Stock Equivalent Fund.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	The number of Stock Equivalents, or fractions thereof, that will be credited to a Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account and/or Post-2016 RSU Dividend Deferral Account is determined by dividing the dollar amount of Fee Deferrals and/or Post-2016 RSU Dividend Deferrals to be credited to the Stock Equivalent Fund, by the Fair Market Value of the Company common stock on the date of crediting. To the extent dividends or other distributions on the Company&#146;s common stock are paid or made, dividend equivalents and fractions thereof will be calculated and credited with respect to the Stock Equivalent balances (by dividing the value of the dividend equivalents by the Fair Market Value) as an increase in Stock Equivalents as of the dividend payment dates.&#160; Upon the occurrence of any stock split, stock dividend, combination or reclassification with respect to any outstanding class of stock of the Company, the number of Stock Equivalents deemed invested in the Stock Equivalent Fund will, to the extent deemed necessary by the Board of Directors, be adjusted accordingly.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	6.4
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Vesting and Forfeiture.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;The Fee Deferrals held in each Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account will be fully vested at all times.&#160; A Participant&#146;s Matching Contributions (and any related deemed earnings) will become vested on January&nbsp;1st, of the calendar year that is five years after the date the Matching Contribution was credited to Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account.&#160; Notwithstanding the immediately preceding sentence, if prior to the occurrence of such vesting (a)&nbsp;the Participant dies, (b)&nbsp;the Participant&#146;s Board service is terminated due to Disability or (c)&nbsp;a Change in Control occurs, such Participant&#146;s Matching Contributions will become fully vested as of the date of death, the date of Disability or the date of the Change in Control, as applicable.&#160; If a Participant receives distributions from, or transfers amounts deemed invested in the Stock Equivalent Fund before the Matching Contributions are fully vested, such unvested accrued balance in such Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account will be forfeited by such Participant to the extent attributable to the Fee Deferrals distributed or transferred.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	A Participant will vest in his or her RSU Deferral Account and RSU Dividend Deferral Account pursuant to the grant agreement under which the Director&#146;s RSUs were awarded.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	6.5
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Designation of Beneficiary.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;Each Participant may designate a Beneficiary or Beneficiaries who, upon the Participant&#146;s death, or physical or mental incapacity will receive the distributions that otherwise would have been paid to the Participant under the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Page
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	9
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	of 16
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-10_22_HTM_1035-3-LG-03_PB_9_114058_3315">
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=9,EFW="2230876",CP="FLUOR CORPORATION",DN="5",CHK=133262,FOLIO='PAGE 9',FILE="DISK106:[17ZAA3.17ZAA13503]1035-3-LG-03_ZAA13503.CHC",USER="JVANGB",CD='FEB 12 16:52 2017' -->
<A NAME="eolPage41"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	All Beneficiary designations will be signed by the Participant, and will be in the form prescribed by the Administrative Committee.&#160; Each Beneficiary designation will be effective as of the date delivered to the Plan Administrator by the Participant.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Participants may change their Beneficiary designations on such form as prescribed by the Plan Administrator.&#160; The payment of distributions payable under the Plan will be in accordance with the last unrevoked written Beneficiary designation that has been signed by the Participant and delivered to the Plan Administrator prior to the Participant&#146;s death.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, a Participant who is married may not designate a Beneficiary other than the Participant&#146;s spouse, unless the spouse consents in writing to such alternate Beneficiary designation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	In the event that all the Beneficiaries named by a Participant pursuant to this Section&nbsp;6.5 predecease the Participant, the distributions payable to the Participant or the Participant&#146;s Beneficiaries will be paid to the Participant&#146;s estate.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	In the event a Participant does not designate a Beneficiary, or for any reason such designation is ineffective, in whole or in part, the amounts that otherwise would have been paid to the Participant or the Participant&#146;s Beneficiaries under the Plan will be paid to the Participant&#146;s estate.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;7
<BR>
	DISTRIBUTIONS
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7.1
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Specified Distribution Year.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;With respect to the vested portion of the Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account as to which a specified distribution year has been selected by the Participant at the time of deferral:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Distributions under this Section&nbsp;7.1 will commence in January&nbsp;of the year specified in the Participant&#146;s initial deferral election unless the Participant has made a subsequent deferral election pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.3.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	In the case of installment payments, the second installment will be paid in January&nbsp;following the year in which the first installment was paid and all remaining installments will be paid annually in each succeeding January.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	If a Participant elects to receive installment payments, the amount of each installment payment will be equal to the balance remaining in the portion of the Participant&#146;s vested Fee Deferral Account that is subject to such installment election (as determined immediately prior to each such payment), multiplied by a fraction, the numerator of which is one, and the denominator of which is the total number of remaining installment payments.&#160; The installment amount will be adjusted annually to reflect gains and losses, if any, allocated to such Participant&#146;s vested Fee Deferral Account pursuant to ARTICLE&nbsp;6.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Notwithstanding any specified distribution year election by a Participant, if a Participant incurs a Termination of Service for any reason prior to receiving full payment of the Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account or while the Participant is receiving scheduled installment payments pursuant to this Section&nbsp;7.1, the unpaid portion of the Participant&#146;s Deferred Account will be paid in accordance with Section&nbsp;7.2 below.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Page
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	10
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	of 16
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-10_22_HTM_1035-3-LG-03_PB_10_114153_7608">
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
