<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=10,EFW="2230876",CP="FLUOR CORPORATION",DN="5",CHK=419294,FOLIO='PAGE 10',FILE="DISK106:[17ZAA3.17ZAA13503]1035-3-LG-03_ZAA13503.CHC",USER="JVANGB",CD='FEB 12 16:52 2017' -->
<A NAME="eolPage42"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7.2
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Distributions upon Termination of Service, Disability, or Death.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;With respect to the vested portion of the Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account as to which a Termination of Service distribution has been selected by the Participant at the time of deferral and with respect to the Participant&#146;s vested RSU Deferral Account and RSU Dividend Deferral Account:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Distributions under this Section&nbsp;7.2 will commence in the month following Termination of Service (including if due to Disability or Death), unless the Participant has made a subsequent deferral election pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.3.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	In the case of installment payments, the second installment will be paid in January&nbsp;following the year in which the first installment was paid and all remaining installments will be paid annually in January.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	If a Participant elects to receive installment payments with respect to his or her Fee Deferral Account and RSU Deferral Account, the amount of each installment payment will be equal to the sum of:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	the balance remaining in the portion of the vested Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account, that is subject to such installment election (as determined immediately prior to each such payment), multiplied by a fraction, the numerator of which is one, and the denominator of which is the total number of remaining installment payments.&#160; The installment amount will be adjusted annually to reflect gains and losses, if any, allocated to such Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account pursuant to ARTICLE&nbsp;6;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	the number of restricted stock units remaining in the vested portion of the Participant&#146;s RSU Deferral Account that is subject to such installment election (as determined immediately prior to each such payment), multiplied by a fraction, the numerator of which is one, and the denominator of which is the total number of remaining installment payments; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	the amount of dividends remaining in the vested portion of the Participant&#146;s RSU Dividend Deferral Account that is subject to such installment election (as determined immediately prior to each such payment), multiplied by a fraction, the numerator of which is one, and the denominator of which is the total number of remaining installment payments.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Notwithstanding any election made pursuant to Section&nbsp;7.1, if the Participant has a Termination of Service before all distributions are made pursuant thereto, such election will no longer apply and the deferral election applicable to distributions to be made in connection with the Participant&#146;s Termination of Service (including if due to Disability or Death) for such Plan Year pursuant to this Section&nbsp;7.2 instead will become effective.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Unless otherwise elected pursuant to this Section&nbsp;7.2 or Section&nbsp;5.2, a Participant&#146;s vested Deferral Accounts will be paid as a single lump sum 30 days following the occurrence of a Participant&#146;s Termination of Service (including if due to Disability or death).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Page
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	11
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	of 16
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-10_22_HTM_1035-3-LG-03_PB_11_114200_8146">
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=11,EFW="2230876",CP="FLUOR CORPORATION",DN="5",CHK=486909,FOLIO='PAGE 11',FILE="DISK106:[17ZAA3.17ZAA13503]1035-3-LG-03_ZAA13503.CHC",USER="JVANGB",CD='FEB 12 16:52 2017' -->
<A NAME="eolPage43"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7.3
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Unforeseeable Emergency.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;A Participant may elect to receive a cash distribution of all or a portion of his or her Fee Deferral Account because of an Unforeseeable Emergency only to the extent required by the Participant to satisfy the emergency.&#160; No Unforeseeable Emergency Distribution will be available with respect to a Participant&#146;s RSU Deferral Account or RSU Dividend Deferral Account.&#160; Whether an Unforeseeable Emergency has occurred will be determined solely by the Administrative Committee.&#160; Distributions in the event of an Unforeseeable Emergency may be made by and with the approval of the Administrative Committee upon written request by a Participant.&#160; In all events, a distribution will be made in connection with an Unforeseeable Emergency only to the extent permitted by Section&nbsp;409A of the Code.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	An &#147;
<B>
	Unforeseeable Emergency
</B>
	&#148; is defined as a severe financial hardship to the Participant caused by sudden and unexpected illness or accident of the Participant, the Participant&#146;s spouse, the Participant&#146;s Beneficiary, or of a dependent of the Participant (as defined in Code Section&nbsp;152, without regard to Code Section&nbsp;152(b)(1), (b)(2), and (d)(1)(B)), loss of the Participant&#146;s property due to casualty, or other extraordinary and unforeseeable circumstances caused by a result of events beyond the Participant&#146;s control.&#160; The circumstances that will constitute an Unforeseeable Emergency will depend upon the specific facts of each case, but, in any event, any distribution under this Section&nbsp;7.3 will not exceed the amount required by the Participant to resolve the hardship after (i)&nbsp;reimbursement or compensation through insurance or otherwise, (ii)&nbsp;obtaining liquidation of the Participant&#146;s assets, to the extent such liquidation would not itself cause a severe financial hardship, or (iii)&nbsp;suspension of deferrals under the Plan.&#160; Examples of what are not considered to be severe financial hardships include the need to send a Participant&#146;s child to college or the desire to purchase a home.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	The Participant&#146;s Fee Deferral Account will be credited with earnings in accordance with the Plan up to the date of distribution.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	The Administrative Committee&#146;s decisions with respect to the Unforeseeable Emergency will be final, conclusive, and not subject to appeal to the extent it is not arbitrary and capricious.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	In the event a Participant receives a distribution under this Section&nbsp;7.3, then the Participant will be ineligible to participate in the Plan on an active basis for the remainder of the Plan Year in which the distribution was received (
<I>
	i.e.
</I>
	, Fee Deferrals, RSU Deferrals and RSU Dividend Deferrals will cease for the remainder of the Plan Year).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7.4
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Incompetence of Distributee.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;In the event that it is found that a person entitled to receive payment under the Plan (including a designated Beneficiary) is a minor or is physically or mentally incapable of personally receiving and giving a valid receipt for any payment due (unless prior claim therefor has been made by a duly qualified committee or other legal representative), such payment may be made to any person whom the Plan Administrator in its sole discretion determines is entitled to receive it, and any such payment will fully discharge the Company, the Administrative Committee, the Plan Administrator and the Plan from any further liability to the person otherwise entitled to payment hereunder, to the extent of such payment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Page
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	12
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	of 16
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-10_22_HTM_1035-3-LG-03_PB_12_114243_7091">
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=12,EFW="2230876",CP="FLUOR CORPORATION",DN="5",CHK=692775,FOLIO='PAGE 12',FILE="DISK106:[17ZAA3.17ZAA13503]1035-3-LG-03_ZAA13503.CHC",USER="JVANGB",CD='FEB 12 16:52 2017' -->
<A NAME="eolPage44"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7.5
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Distribution in the Event of Divorce.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;In the event of the divorce or legal separation of a Participant, and the awarding of all or a portion of the Participant&#146;s Deferral Accounts to the spouse of the Participant by court order, such spouse may elect, by filing with the Plan Administrator a form specified by the Plan Administrator and by providing such other information as the Plan Administrator may in its discretion reasonably request in order to confirm that the applicable facts and circumstances are present, to receive a distribution of his or her court-awarded portion of the Participant&#146;s Deferral Accounts in cash or stock, as applicable pursuant and subject to the terms of ARTICLE&nbsp;5 and ARTICLE&nbsp;7 as to available forms of distribution and timing.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;8
<BR>
	TRUST
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Nothing contained in this Plan will create a trust of any kind or a fiduciary relationship between the Company and any Participant.&#160; Nevertheless, the Company may establish one or more trusts, with such trustee(s)&nbsp;as the Administrative Committee may approve, for the purpose of providing for the payment of deferred amounts and earnings thereon.&#160; Such trust or trusts may be irrevocable, but the assets thereof will be subject to the claims of the Company&#146;s general creditors upon the bankruptcy or insolvency of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;9
<BR>
	CHANGE IN CONTROL
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.1
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Trust and Trustees.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;Upon the occurrence of a Change in Control, the trust or trusts that may be established by the Company pursuant to ARTICLE&nbsp;8 will become irrevocable and the Company will not thereafter be permitted to remove, terminate, or change the trustee(s)&nbsp;for a period of three years.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.2
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Advanced Funding.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;No later than 30 days after a Change in Control occurs, to the extent permitted by Code section 409A, the Company will make a contribution to the trust or trust(s)&nbsp;established pursuant to ARTICLE&nbsp;8 to the extent required to fully fund all benefits that are or may become payable under the Plan, assuming for purposes of this calculation that all Participants retire with 100% vesting, and to fund in advance all administrative, legal, and other costs of maintaining the Plan, in an additional amount of no less than $150,000.&#160; From time to time in the Company&#146;s discretion, Company will make such additional contributions to the trust or trusts to fully fund the additional benefits that may become payable to Participants or Beneficiaries under the Plan and the additional administrative, legal, and other Plan expenses.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.3
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Amendment and Termination.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;After the occurrence of a Change in Control, the Company may not amend the Plan without the prior approval of a majority of the Participants.&#160; After a Change in Control, the Company may not terminate the Plan until either (i)&nbsp;all benefits have been paid in full, or (ii)&nbsp;the majority of the Participants approve the same.&#160; For purposes of this Section&nbsp;9.3, Participants&#146; votes will be weighted based on their relative Deferral Account balances.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;10
<BR>
	RIGHTS OF PARTICIPANTS
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.1
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Contractual Obligation.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;The Plan will create an unfunded, unsecured contractual obligation on the part of the Company to make payments from the Participants&#146; Deferral Accounts when due.&#160; Payment of Deferral Account balances will be made out of the general assets of the Company or from the trust or trusts referred to in ARTICLE&nbsp;8 above.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Page
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	13
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	of 16
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-10_22_HTM_1035-3-LG-03_PB_13_114250_455">
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=13,EFW="2230876",CP="FLUOR CORPORATION",DN="5",CHK=954754,FOLIO='PAGE 13',FILE="DISK106:[17ZAA3.17ZAA13503]1035-3-LG-03_ZAA13503.CHC",USER="JVANGB",CD='FEB 12 16:52 2017' -->
<A NAME="eolPage45"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.2
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Unsecured Interest.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;No Participant or party claiming an interest in deferred amounts of a Participant will have any interest whatsoever in any specific asset of the Company.&#160; To the extent that any party acquires a right to receive payments under the Plan, such right will be equivalent to that of an unsecured general creditor of the Company.&#160; Each Participant, by participating hereunder, agrees to waive any priority creditor status for wage payments with respect to any amounts due hereunder.&#160; The Company will have no duty to set aside or invest any amounts credited to Participants&#146; Deferral Accounts under this Plan.&#160; Deferral Accounts established hereunder are solely for bookkeeping purposes and the Company will not be required to segregate any funds based on such Deferral Accounts.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;11
<BR>
	CLAIMS PROCEDURE
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	11.1
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Initial Claim.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;If a Participant or Beneficiary is not enrolled in the Plan or does not receive the benefits he or she believes he or she is owed under the Plan, their authorized representative (referred to as a &#147;
<B>
	Claimant
</B>
	&#148;) may file a claim with the Plan Administrator. The Plan Administrator will respond to the claim within ninety (90) days after receipt of the claim or one hundred and eighty (180) days, if special circumstances require an extension of time, and written notice of the extension is provided to the Claimant before the end of the original ninety (90) days.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	If the claim is denied, the Plan Administrator will send the Claimant a notice that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_64"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	States the specific reasons for the denial,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Cites the pertinent Plan provisions on which the denial is based,
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Describes any additional material or information necessary for the Claimant to perfect the claim and an explanation of why such material or information is necessary,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Explains the Plan&#146;s claims review procedures, the time limits applicable to such procedures and the appeal rights related to the claim, and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Advises the Claimant of the right to bring a civil action under section 502 of ERISA.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	11.2
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Filing an Appeal.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;The Claimant may file a written appeal to the Administrative Committee to request a review of the denied claim within sixty (60) days after he receives notice of the denial of the claim pursuant to Section&nbsp;11.1(a). If an appeal is not filed within this sixty (60) day period, the initial denial pursuant to Section&nbsp;11.1(a)&nbsp;will become final.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	In connection with such appeal, the Claimant may request in writing and free of charge, copies of all documents, records and other information relevant to his or her claim.&#160; The Claimant in his or her appeal may discuss all of the reasons for his or her request for review, list any facts that support such request and provide any additional information he or she feels is helpful in reviewing the appeal.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Page
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	14
</FONT>
<FONT FACE="ARIAL">
	of 16
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-10_22_HTM_1035-3-LG-03_PB_14_114332_4141">
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage46"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	The Administrative Committee will notify the Claimant of its decision in writing within sixty (60) days after receipt of such request, unless special circumstances require an extension of time for processing, in which case the Claimant will be so notified and a decision will be rendered as soon as possible, but not later than one hundred and twenty (120) days after receipt of the request for review.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	If the request for review is denied, the notice will include:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Specific reasons for the decision,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Specific references to the pertinent Plan provisions on which the decision is based,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	information regarding the Claimant&#146;s right to have reasonable access to, and copies of all documents and other information relevant to his or her appeal free of charge, and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Information regarding the Claimant&#146;s right to file suit under section 502(a)&nbsp;of ERISA.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;12
<BR>
	WITHHOLDING OF TAXES
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	The Company will have the right to require Participants to remit to the Company an amount sufficient to satisfy Federal, state, and local withholding tax requirements, or to deduct from all payments made pursuant to the Plan (or from a Participant&#146;s other Director&#146;s Fees) amounts sufficient to satisfy withholding tax requirements.&#160; The Company makes no representations, warranties, or assurances and assumes no responsibility as to the tax consequences of this Plan or participation herein.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;13
<BR>
	AMENDMENT AND TERMINATION
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Subject to ARTICLE&nbsp;9, the Company reserves the right to amend, modify, or terminate the Plan (in whole or in part) at any time by action of the Organization and Compensation Committee, with or without prior notice.&#160; Except as described below in this ARTICLE&nbsp;13, no such amendment or termination will in any material manner adversely affect any Participant&#146;s rights to any amounts already deferred or credited hereunder or deemed earnings thereon, up to the date of amendment or termination, without the consent of the Participant.&#160; Any amounts accumulated in Deferral Accounts prior to the Plan&#146;s termination will continue to be subject to the provisions of the Plan until distributed under the terms of the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;14
<BR>
	MISCELLANEOUS
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	14.1
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Notice.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;Any notice or filing required or permitted to be given to the Company under the Plan will be sufficient if in writing and hand delivered, or sent by registered or certified mail to the Fluor Corporation 409A Director Deferred Compensation Program c/o the Plan Administrator, and if mailed, will be addressed to the principal executive offices of the Company.&#160;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Page
</FONT>

	15

	of 16

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=15,EFW="2230876",CP="FLUOR CORPORATION",DN="5",CHK=80106,FOLIO='PAGE 15',FILE="DISK106:[17ZAA3.17ZAA13503]1035-3-LG-03_ZAA13503.CHC",USER="JVANGB",CD='FEB 12 16:52 2017' -->
<A NAME="eolPage47"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	Notice mailed to a Participant will be at such address as is given in the records of the Company.&#160; Notices to the Company will be deemed given as of the date of delivery.&#160; Notice to a Participant or Beneficiary will be deemed given as of the date of hand delivery, or if delivery is made by mail, three days following the postmark date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	14.2
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Nontransferability.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;Except as provided in Section&nbsp;7.5 and this Section&nbsp;14.2, Participants&#146; rights to deferred amounts and deemed earnings credited thereon under the Plan may not be sold, transferred, assigned, or otherwise alienated or hypothecated, other than by will or by the laws of descent and distribution, or pursuant to a domestic relations order, nor will the Company make any payment under the Plan to any assignee or creditor of a Participant.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	14.3
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Responsibility for Legal Effect.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;Neither the Administrative Committee nor the Plan Administrator nor the Company makes any representations or warranties, express or implied, or assumes any responsibility concerning the legal, tax or other implications or effects of this Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	14.4
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Severability.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;In the event any provision of the Plan will be held illegal or invalid for any reason, the illegality or invalidity will not affect the remaining parts of the Plan, and the Plan will be construed and enforced as if the illegal or invalid provision had not been included.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	14.5
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Gender and Number.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;Except where otherwise indicated by the context, any masculine term used herein also will include the feminine; the plural will include the singular, and the singular will include the plural.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	14.6
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Costs of the Plan.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;All costs of implementing and administering the Plan will be borne by the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	14.7
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Successors.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;All obligations of the Company under the Plan will be binding on any successor to the Company, whether the existence of such successor is the result of a direct or indirect purchase, merger, consolidation, or otherwise, of all or substantially all of the business and/or assets of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	14.8
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Applicable Law.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;Except to the extent preempted by applicable Federal law, the Plan will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the state of Delaware.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	14.9
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	No Duplication.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;In no event will the benefit provided under the Plan duplicate any benefits accrued and/or payable under the Fluor Corporation Deferred Directors&#146; Fees Program (frozen effective December&nbsp;31, 2004).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	14.10
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section&nbsp;409A Compliance.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&#160;The provisions of the Plan will be construed and administered in a manner that enables the Plan to comply with the provisions of section 409A of the Code.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:11.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

	Mozambique

<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31"></A>
<BR>
<FONT SIZE=3>
<A HREF="#A2230876ZEX-31_1_HTM_17ZAA13501_8">
	QuickLinks
</A>

	-- Click here to rapidly navigate through this document
</FONT>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"#000000" -->
<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;" -->
<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLESHADECOLOR,"#CCEEFF" -->
<!-- COMMAND=ADD_STABLERULES,"BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID #000000 1.0PT;" -->
<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DTABLERULES,"BORDER-BOTTOM:DOUBLE #000000 2.25PT;" -->
<!-- COMMAND=ADD_SCRTABLERULES,"BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID #000000 1.0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;" -->

<!-- PARA=JUSTIFY -->
</FONT>
</P>
<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-31_1_HTM_KG13501_EXHIBIT_31_1">
</A>
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-31_1_HTM_TOC_KG13501_1">
</A>
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;31.1
<BR>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-31_1_HTM_KG13501_CERTIFICATION_OF_CHIEF_EXECUTI__CER03934">
</A>
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-31_1_HTM_TOC_KG13501_2">
</A>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
	CERTIFICATION OF CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
<BR>
	PURSUANT TO RULE 13a-14(a) OR RULE 15d-14(a)
<BR>
	OF THE SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT OF&nbsp;1934
<BR>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	I,
	David T. Seaton, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;I
	have reviewed this annual report on Form&nbsp;10-K of Fluor Corporation;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Based
	on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in
	light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Based
	on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition,
	results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	registrant's other certifying officers and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act
	Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<UL>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Designed
	such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material
	information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being
	prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Designed
	such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide
	reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Evaluated
	the effectiveness of the registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure
	controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Disclosed
	in this report any change in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant's most recent fiscal quarter (the
	registrant's fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control over financial
	reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
</UL>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	registrant's other certifying officers and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant's
	auditors and the audit committee of registrant's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<UL>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All
	significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely
	affect the registrant's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any
	fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY:NONE;*DISPLAY:BLOCK;MARGIN-TOP:-1PT;">
</DIV>
</UL>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING:0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;WIDTH:80%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;MARGIN-LEFT:0%;">

<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31_2"></A>
<BR>
<FONT SIZE=3>
<A HREF="#A2230876ZEX-31_2_HTM_17ZAA13501_9">
	QuickLinks
</A>
</FONT>

<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"#000000" -->
<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;" -->
<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLESHADECOLOR,"#CCEEFF" -->
<!-- COMMAND=ADD_STABLERULES,"BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID #000000 1.0PT;" -->
<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DTABLERULES,"BORDER-BOTTOM:DOUBLE #000000 2.25PT;" -->
<!-- COMMAND=ADD_SCRTABLERULES,"BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID #000000 1.0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;" -->

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-31_2_HTM_KI13501_EXHIBIT_31_2">
</A>
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-31_2_HTM_TOC_KI13501_1">
</A>
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;31.2
<BR>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_2"></A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-31_2_HTM_KI13501_CERTIFICATION_OF_CHIEF_FINANCI__CER03889">
</A>
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-31_2_HTM_TOC_KI13501_2">
</A>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
	CERTIFICATION OF CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
<BR>
	PURSUANT TO RULE 13a-14(a) OR RULE 15d-14(a)
<BR>
	OF THE SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT OF&nbsp;1934
<BR>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	I,
	Biggs C. Porter, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;I
	have reviewed this annual report on Form&nbsp;10-K of Fluor Corporation;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Based
	on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in
	light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Based
	on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition,
	results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	registrant's other certifying officers and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act
	Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<UL>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Designed
	such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material
	information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being
	prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Designed
	such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide
	reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Evaluated
	the effectiveness of the registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure
	controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Disclosed
	in this report any change in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant's most recent fiscal quarter (the
	registrant's fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control over financial
	reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
</UL>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	registrant's other certifying officers and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant's
	auditors and the audit committee of registrant's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<UL>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All
	significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely
	affect the registrant's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any
	fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY:NONE;*DISPLAY:BLOCK;MARGIN-TOP:-1PT;">
</DIV>
</UL>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING:0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;WIDTH:80%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;MARGIN-LEFT:0%;">

</TD>
<!-- TABLE COLUMN WIDTHS END -->

	Date: February&nbsp;17, 2017

<FONT SIZE=2>
<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"#000000" -->

<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-32_1_HTM_KK13501_EXHIBIT_32_1">
</A>
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-32_1_HTM_TOC_KK13501_1">

<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;32.1
<BR>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-32_1_HTM_KK13501_CERTIFICATION_OF_CHIEF_EXECUTI__CER04495">
</A>
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-32_1_HTM_TOC_KK13501_2">
</A>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
	CERTIFICATION OF CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
<BR>
	PURSUANT TO RULE 13a-14(b) OR RULE 15d-14(b)
<BR>
	OF THE SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT OF&nbsp;1934
<BR>
	AND 18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350
<BR>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In connection with the Annual Report of Fluor Corporation (the "Company") on Form&nbsp;10-K for the period ended December&nbsp;31, 2016, as
	filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the "Report"), I, David T. Seaton, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of the Company, certify, for purposes of 18 U.S.C.
	Section&nbsp;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that to my knowledge:
</FONT>
</P>
<UL>
<DL COMPACT>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	the Report fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended; and
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	the information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the
	Company.
</FONT>
</DD>
</DL>
</UL>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY:NONE;*DISPLAY:BLOCK;MARGIN-TOP:-1PT;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING:0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;WIDTH:80%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;MARGIN-LEFT:0%;">

</TD>

<FONT SIZE=2>
<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"#000000" -->
<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;" -->
<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLESHADECOLOR,"#CCEEFF" -->

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_4"></A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-32_2_HTM_KM13501_CERTIFICATION_OF_CHIEF_FINANCI__CER04450">
</A>
<A NAME="A2230876ZEX-32_2_HTM_TOC_KM13501_2">
</A>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
	CERTIFICATION OF CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
<BR>
	PURSUANT TO RULE 13a-14(b) OR RULE 15d-14(b)
<BR>
	OF THE SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT OF&nbsp;1934
<BR>
	AND 18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350
<BR>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In connection with the Annual Report of Fluor Corporation (the "Company") on Form&nbsp;10-K for the period ended December&nbsp;31, 2016, as
	filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the "Report"), I, Biggs C. Porter, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of the Company, certify, for purposes of
	18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that to my knowledge:
</FONT>
</P>
<UL>
<DL COMPACT>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	the Report fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended; and
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&#149;
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	the information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the
	Company.
</FONT>
</DD>
</DL>
</UL>

</DIV>
